character.description: The Kaientai is operated by http://anidb.net/ch1674 [Sakamoto Tatsuma] as a commercial outfit, using many ships to traverse the universe for business opportunities. Source: Gintama Wiki

character.name: Musashi
character.description: A homeless man who wears large glasses and an orange cap without pants. He seems to have many talents, including badminton. He`s very similar to Hasegawa in that they are both often seen doing various oddjobs. Musashi has the eyes of a Samurai. Despite looking completely different otherwise, he is sometimes mistaken for Gintoki due to their similar hairstyles. In the credits, he`s usually listed as "Musashi-like" person.

character.name: Yato Zoku
character.description: A race of Amanto with far above average fighting abilities and strength. Often recognizable by the umbrellas that they use both to guard from sunlight and as their primary weapon of choice.

character.name: RX-78-2 Gundam
character.description: The Gundam is one of three prototype mobile suits secretly developed by the embattled Earth Federation. After suffering tremendous losses to Zeon`s mobile suits earlier in the war, the Federation set out to create its own, using the very latest advanced technology. The Gundam is the most successful of these prototypes, a close-combat mobile suit protected by tough Luna Titanium armour, and armed with both lethal beam sabers and a devastating beam rifle as powerful as a battleship cannon. It`s also equipped with an advanced computer which learns from its pilot, ultimately enabling it to operate the Gundam automatically. In the hands of accidental pilot Amuro Ray, this one prototype mobile suit proves to be the equal of any Zeon weapon.

character.name: Jii
character.description: Jii is prince http://anidb.net/ch1677 [Hata]`s retainer and can usually be found at the prince`s side. He is a rather old looking, bespectacled Amanto with grey hair and green skin. Similarly to prince Hata he has an antennae attached to his forehead. Source: Gintama Wiki

character.name: Ginpachi-sensei
character.description: A sloppily worn lab coat, lifeless eyes just like a dead fish`s. He`s the most un-teacher-like high school teacher, Sakata Ginpachi. The class he`s in charge of, 3Z, is filled with `intensive` students who have created a horrifying amusement park.

character.name: Ginko
character.description: Gintoki`s online avatar in the "Screwdriver"-arc

character.name: Kaguura Jasuanto
character.description: Kagura`s online avatar in the "Screwdriver"-arc

character.name: Pattsuan
character.description: Shinpachi`s online avatar in the "Screwdriver"-arc

character.name: Fruit Punch Samurai G
character.description: Katsura`s online avatar in the "screwdriver"-arc

character.name: Fruit Chinpo Samurai G
character.description: Kondo`s online avatar in the "screwdriver"-arc

character.name: Saruko
character.description: Ayame`s online avatar in the "screwdriver"-arc

character.name: M
character.description: Madao`s online avatar in the "screwdriver"-arc

character.name: Senpai
character.description: Hijikata`s online avatar in the "screwdriver"-arc

character.name: Kouhai
character.description: Okita`s online avatar in the "screwdriver"-arc

character.name: Ketsuno Christel
character.description: "Ana" from her alias is an abbreviation for "announcer". The dual meaning of "Ketsuno Ana" is "announcer Ketsuno" and "anus","asshole".

character.name: Tagosaku
character.description: The strongest "Stand" of Senboukyou Inn.

character.name: Ginta
character.description: Main Character in the Manga Gintaman a spoof of the Gintama Series in the Series itself

character.name: Ginta
character.description: Main Character in the Manga Gintaman a spoof of the Gintama Series in the Series itself

character.name: Amachi Hideaki
character.description: The mangaka of the spoof manga gintaman.

character.name: Daitou
character.description: An editor working for shueisha on the gintaman manga.

character.name: Konishi Kouhei
character.description: An editor working for shueisha. He used to edit the gintaman manga, but nowadays he`s working on One Park (obvious spoof on One Piece)

character.name: Nakajima Mikako
character.description: Childhood friend of Ginta in the Gintaman manga.

character.name: Nakajima Mikako
character.description: Childhood friend of Ginta in the Gintaman manga.

character.name: Nakajima Mitsuko
character.description: Mikakos sister.

character.name: Nakajima Hiroshi
character.description: Mikako`s son.

character.name: Koishi
character.description: Another mangaka.

character.name: Tonakai no Ben
character.description: Santa`s reindeer

character.name: Tsukishima Yuri
character.description: A girl that wished for a new mum and got her wish granted by santa.

character.name: Tama
character.description: Tama inside of http://anidb.net/ch17300 [Kurin-chan]`s body.

character.name: Jigsaw
character.description: Obvious spoof on the character from SAW.

character.name: Tokugawa Shigeshige
character.description: Also known as the Great General 大将軍 dai shogun, the ruling Shogunate of Edo in Gintama world. Older brother of http://anidb.net/ch16867 [Sayo Hime]. In Episode 83 he was seen by Yorozuya at http://anidb.net/ch16984 [Snack Smile] club to have very small male genitalia. He seems to have terrible luck as regardless of the http://anidb.net/ch10409 [Yorozuya] attempts to help him enjoy himself, he was constantly put in more and more humiliating positions thanks to their game.

character.name: Tosshi
character.description: A sort of split personality of Hijikata that appeared after he got cursed by a sword.

character.name: Terakado Tsuu Shin`eitai
character.description: A group of people lead by Shinpachi adoring the idol Otsu.

character.name: Tsusengumi
character.description: A sort of "universal media club" not restricted to just the idol otsu lead by toshi.

character.name: Makoto-chan
character.description: The depressed (because he apparently shot a girl with a bow which he carries on it`s back) mascot of the Shinsengumi introduced by Otsuu in ep 56. It`s basically Gintoki up front, Shinpachi on the back and Kagura riding on it.

character.name: Taka-tin
character.description: The "body double"/stand-in for http://anidb.net/ch11972 [Taka-chin] after he got run over by http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Okita]. Possesses immense strength and a taste for French bread.

character.name: Ill Smith
character.description: When Katsura got sick he turned into Ill Smith. "YES WE CAN!"

character.name: Kuraba Touma
character.description: Kuraba Touma is http://anidb.net/ch12345 [Okita Mitsuba]`s fiance. He pretended to ask for her hand in marriage in order to get close to http://anidb.net/ch6221 [Shinsengumi] and manipulate them from behind the scene in order to facilitate his own illegal dealings with Joui extremists. Eliminated by http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Okita Sougo] in the http://anidb.net/ch6221 [Shinsengumi] raid during the military arms transaction with http://anidb.net/ch6222 [Jouishishi] extremists at the harbour.

character.name: Okita Mitsuba
character.description: Single-handedly brought up younger brother http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Okita Sougo] when their parents passed away while Sougo was still very young, Okita Mitsuba admitted herself that she pampered http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Sougo] until he is spoilt rotten, resulting in the aloof character that he is now. She took such great care of him that she neglected her own health and developed tuberculosis, and forfeited her own chance for marriage when she was of marriageable age. As a result, http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Sougo] respected her immensely, addressing her very respectfully as ane-ue (姉上) and using the formal courteous form boku (僕) to refer to himself when speaking to her. She in turn called http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Sougo] affectionately as sou-chan. Mitsuba`s sickly condition deteriorated when she came to Edo to be with her husband-to-be http://anidb.net/ch12344 [Kuraba Touma], who unbeknown to her, was using her and http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Sougo] as pawns in order to `buy over` http://anidb.net/ch6221 [Shinsengumi] so as to allow his own illicit arms trade with http://anidb.net/ch6222 [Joui] extremists. Sends http://anidb.net/ch6221 [Shinsengumi] tear-inducing extra-spicy senbei (flavoured rice crackers) every month. Her last words to http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Sougo] before she passed away in Episode 87 were `You are the brother that I am so proud of`. Though younger brother http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Okita Sougo] resembled her a lot superficially, character-wise they are exact opposite. Mitsuba is the archetypal virtuous female character, termed yamato nadeshiko (大和撫子) aka traditional feminine virtues of olden Japan, as well as the stereotype figure of bijin hakumei (美人薄命) aka the beautiful die young. Loves to add spice to all the food she eats, fanaticism on par with http://anidb.net/ch1167 [Hijikata] and his mayonnaise. Adds tabasco sauce to chocolate parfait. Expressed her wish to follow http://anidb.net/ch1167 [Hijikata Toushirou] to Edo when they were still in Bushuu (武州), but was rejected by him, out of concern for her safety and happiness. Although it is revealed that http://anidb.net/ch1167 [Hijikata] does in fact love her, he feels that he is unable to give her happiness, that is why he treats her coldly.

character.name: Kumoderu Jiraia
character.description: Jiraia the Spider (real name Danzou Tobita) was born in he country side to Iga Samurai, and had a talent for ninjutsu since he was a kid. The Tobitas were a prominent household charged with being the land owners. He was next in line to inherit the family`s power, but someone did not agree with this. So big fights began, and the Tobitas were destroyed. Only Danzou and his sister survived, and in order to protect his sister, Danzou had to work under the people he hated. He became a war machine, and tried to escape reality by fighting. Her sister, knowing that she was the problem, threw herself from a cliff. Danzou could not forgive himself of being unable to protect his sister. So he burned his face and lived a life in solitude. He tried to kill the Shogun, but Hattori`s father stopped him. In the end, to stop his pain, he decided to get killed by someone who resembles him. So he raised a student, Tsukuyo, and taught her everything he knew. So Jiraia came back to Yoshiwara to take Tsukuyo. He defeated Gintoki, because he thought that he was one of Tsukuyo`s weakness. Then he burned the other Tsukuyo`s weakness, Yoshiwara. But thanks to Shinpachi, Kagura, Hattori and Hinowa, the fire was extinguished. Gintoki went to save Tsukuyo from Jiraia, and the fight began. Jiraia was defeated by Gintoki, but he was killed by Tsukuyo, like he wanted. He died looking at the moon, embracing Tsukuyo. He was the strongest man in the Oniwabanshu, and the one who created the Hyakka. His name is based on Jiraiya.

character.name: Terakado Ichi
character.description: Terakado Ichi is http://anidb.net/ch12368 [Otsu]`s mother and manager.

character.name: Tsuu no Chichioya
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch1651 [Otsu]`s father. Currently in jail for murder. With http://anidb.net/ch1164 [Kagura]`s and http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Gintoki]`s help, he managed to attend his daughter`s first solo concert.

character.name: Ishida "Pierre" Genpachi Zaemon
character.description: Ishida was a carpenter and advisor of the Kabukicho Town Council, who came to http://anidb.net/ch10409 [Yorozuya] as customer. His request was for one of them to become his assistant.

character.name: Yoshida Shouyou
character.description: Teacher/mentor to the Old Jouishishi members in their youth.

character.name: Tobita Danzou
character.description: Jiraia the Spider (real name Danzou Tobita) was born in he country side to Iga Samurai, and had a talent fo ninjutsu since he was a kid. The Tobitas were a prominent household charged with being the land owners. He was next in line to inherit the family`s power, but someone did not agree with this. So big fights began, and the Tobitas were destroyed. Only Danzou and his sister survived, and in order to protect his sister, Danzou had to work under the people he hated. He became a war machine, and tried to escape reality by fighting. Her sister, knowing that she was the problem, threw herself from a cliff. Danzou could not forgive himself of being unable to protect his sister. So he burned his face and lived a life in solitude. He tried to kill the Shogun, but Hattori`s father stopped him. In the end, to stop his pain, he decided to get killed by someone who resemles him. So he raised a student, Tsukuyo, and taught her everything he knew. So Jiraia came back to Yoshiwara to take Tsukuyo. He defeated Gintoki, because he thought that he was one of Tsukuyo`s weakness. Then he burned the other Tsukuyo`s weakness, Yoshiwara. But thanks to Shinpachi, Kagura, Hattori and Hinowa, the fire was extinguished. Gintoki went to save Tsukuyo from Jiraia, and the fight began. Jiraia was defeated by Gintoki, but he was killed by Tsukuyo, like he wanted. He died looking at the moon, embracing Tsukuyo. He was the strongest man in the Oniwabanshu, and the one who created the Hyakka. His name is based on Jiraiya.

character.name: Sorachi Hideaki
character.description: Cameo of the manga author drawn by the author himself. The kanji character on the T-shirt is 俺 ore, aka `I`.

character.name: Heidi
character.description: Heidi is an orphan child, happy and carefree, loving and interested in everything that happens around her. Whether its the ringing of church bells, the sounds of the trees, her grandfather`s homemade cheese or fresh cheese cake - Heidi appreciates the little things of everyday life. Because she is always helpful and caring, Heidi soon wins the hearts of all. And of course she would never exchange the beloved animals and mountains against the confines of city life.

character.name: Ojiisan
character.description: The grumpy old grandfather of Heidi lives like a hermit in a small hut on his alm. He has little contact with the inhabitants of the village below and they in return think he is strange and avoid him. When Heidi`s aunt drops her off at his place he is far from happy about it. He soon learns to appreciate Heidi`s joyful, honest way which also makes him more helpful and friendly towards other people.

character.name: Hongou Hisashi
character.description: A sickly boy whose dream it is to get perfect attendance at the radio exercises.

character.name: Kurogoma Katsuo
character.description: Leader of a gang that likes to have a 7:3 hairstyle.

character.name: Ketsuno Seimei
character.description: The big brother of Ketsuno Christel/Ana.

character.name: Kondou Isao
character.description: In http://anidb.net/ch1167 [Toshi]`s dream, http://anidb.net/ch1657 [Kondo] is apparently a snot monster from outer space that took form of a gorilla aka Kondo.

character.name: Kamui
character.description: In one of the nonstandard gintama plot kamui is a transfer student at Yato High.

character.name: Abuto
character.description: Abuto as a student at Yato High in another parallel world of Gintama.

character.name: Umibouzu
character.description: A teacher at yato high in another parallel world of gintama.

character.name: Ungyou
character.description: Ungyou is a student at Yato High in another parallel world of Gintama.

character.name: Kyomu
character.description: Hiro`s mom. He calls her `Nothingness`, as she`s "not there".

character.name: JUMP no Are
character.description: The personification of the Logo of the http://anidb.net/cr5372 [Weekly Shounen Jump] magazine.

character.name: Shirino Douman
character.description: Leader of the Shirino Clan, the enemy and neighbour of the Ketsuno Clan.

character.name: Shimura Tae
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch11433 [Ginpachi-sensei]`s student.

character.name: Kagura
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch11433 [Ginpachi-sensei]`s student.

character.name: Hijikata Toushirou
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch11433 [Ginpachi-sensei]`s student.

character.name: Kondou Isao
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch11433 [Ginpachi-sensei]`s student.

character.name: Shimura Shinpachi
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch11433 [Ginpachi-sensei]`s student.

character.name: Kuromi
character.description: Kuromi is the cat http://anidb.net/ch10409 [Yorozuya] was hired to find.

character.name: Shachou
character.description: President of money lending company. Real name is unknown.

character.name: Inoue Kumichou
character.description: Inoue is the leader of the gang http://anidb.net/ch1164 [Kagura] joined when she first came to earth. Inoue found Kagura and he knew in an instant that she is a descendant of the http://anidb.net/ch10785 [Yato clan] so he offered to give her food in exchange for the services that Kagura would provide for him, which was to fight other gangs that were competing with Inoue`s own gang, Punch Perm. Kagura found out later that she was fooled by Inoue and she later left the group after beating Inoue and shaving his afro. Afterwards, she became a member of the http://anidb.net/ch10409 [Yorozuya]. Inoue appears wearing a pair of sunglasses and an afro, the trademark of his gang. Source: Gintama Wiki

character.name: Katsura Kotarou
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch11433 [Ginpachi-sensei]`s student.

character.name: Okita Sougo
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch11433 [Ginpachi-sensei]`s student.

character.name: Hasegawa Taizou
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch11433 [Ginpachi-sensei]`s student.

character.name: No. 49
character.description: No. 49 was 49th member of http://anidb.net/ch11970 [Terakado Tsuu Shin`eitai] until he attempted to eat http://anidb.net/ch1651 [Otsu].

character.name: Pesu
character.description: Pesu is one of the prince http://anidb.net/ch1677 [Hata]`s many pets.

character.name: Pesu
character.description: Overcooked http://anidb.net/ch16839 [Pesu]. After Pesu escaped, http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Gintoki], http://anidb.net/ch1164 [Kagura] and http://anidb.net/ch1163 [Shinpachi] got stuck in the jar that was supposed to lure Pesu out and rolled down the hill, flattening Pesu in process. They brought back Pesu to http://anidb.net/ch1677 [Prince Hata] and http://anidb.net/ch1655 [Hasegawa] and were told cooking it in hot water will bring it to its normal size. Kagura, however, boiled it in a big pot of water, making it grow large. Pasu went on a rampage and was killed shortly after by Gintoki.

character.name: Muu-san
character.description: Producer from an advertising firm.

character.name: Daraku
character.description: Daraku is one of leaders of http://anidb.net/ch16863 [Harusame].

character.name: Harusame
character.description: Space pirate organization.

character.name: Kimiko
character.description: Kimiko - Yorozuya insisted on calling her Hamuko. She is a girlfriend of grown-up Tasuke.

character.name: Oyaji
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch16864 [Kimiko]`s father. Real name is unknown.

character.name: Soyo-hime
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch11860 [Shogun]`s sister.

character.name: Oonishi
character.description: Former subordinate of http://anidb.net/ch1655 [Hasegawa Taizou].

character.name: Hiraga Saburou
character.description: Saburou is http://anidb.net/ch1678 [Gengai]`s son. He wasn`t good with sword, but he was really good mechanic. He joined http://anidb.net/ch10407 [Kiheitai] in order to prove his worth to his father.

character.name: Fundoshi Kamen
character.description: He masks his face with red loincloth and runs around at night in just his briefs. He only steals underwear from pretty ladies, distributing it to all men who are unpopular with women.

character.name: Ka Mitai na Amanto
character.description: Mosquito-like alien.

character.name: Ebina-san
character.description: Kappa-like alien.

character.name: Shoujo
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch16889 [Ebina-san]`s friend. Real name is unknown.

character.name: Aku no Soshiki no Leader
character.description: Leader of http://anidb.net/ch17233 [evil organization]. Real name is unknown.

character.name: Yocchan
character.description: Bully, self-proclaimed "King of Kabuki-cho", and natural enemy of "Queen of Kabuki-cho" (http://anidb.net/ch1164 [Kagura]).

character.name: Ken-chan
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch16924 [Yocchan]`s accomplice.

character.name: Souchou
character.description: Leader of http://anidb.net/ch16927 [Bulldog].

character.name: Kusano Hitoyoshi
character.description: A Newscaster in Oedo TV. His name was paid homage to Kusano Hitoshi. He has a habit on calling http://anidb.net/ch1677 [Prince Hata] a stupid prince that berated him. In Episode 29-B, Kusano interviewed http://anidb.net/ch1677 [Prince Hata] over the giant cockroaches infested in all of Oedo, particularly Kabuki-cho. Once Baka... Hata explained the infestation, he gave the stupid prince a camel clutch, or other submission moves.

character.name: Nazo no Kage
character.description: Fan of http://anidb.net/ch1651 [Terakado Tsuu].

character.name: Harada Unosuke
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch1657 [Kondou]`s supporter. Moved to tears by macho yakuza movies like Alien vs Yakusa parody of Alien vs Predator.

character.name: Mamushi no Banzou
character.description: The originator of the http://anidb.net/ch16972 [Justaway] explosive. He used to work in a government but got laid off due to company restructuring, and he became a terrorist in his bitterness. He started a factory, taking in displaced and bitter samurai who also wanted revenge. The factory acts as a front for the manufacture of http://anidb.net/ch16972 [Justaway], which is actually a bomb. http://anidb.net/ch1658 [Yamazaki Sagaru] was sent here as a spy to uncover more about the mysterious http://anidb.net/ch16972 [Justaway] in Episode 32. It turned out that the factory also manufactured heavy artillery like the http://anidb.net/ch16974 [Mamushi Z] laser canon.

character.name: Justaway
character.description: Justaway is a merchandise-line of dull looking figurines created by http://anidb.net/ch16971 [Banzou]. In truth these small toys are actually destructive bombs that http://anidb.net/ch16971 [Banzou] sells to the http://anidb.net/ch6222 [Jouishishi] without attracting the attention of the http://anidb.net/ch6221 [Shinsengumi] as they only appear to be harmless toys.

character.name: Unkei
character.description: Delivery carpenter.

character.name: Kaikei
character.description: Delivery carpenter.

character.name: Gunsou
character.description: Sergeant of http://anidb.net/ch11970 [Terakado Tsuu Shin`eitai]. Real name is unknown.

character.name: Snack Smile
character.description: Snack Smile is a hostess pub/bar that caters to male customers primarily. http://anidb.net/ch1169 [Shimura Tae] works here as a hostess (or bouncer, depending on circumstances) together with http://anidb.net/ch16983 [Oryou], Ane (阿音) and http://anidb.net/ch16985 [Hanako]. http://anidb.net/ch1660 [Matsudaira Katakuriko] is a frequent VIP customer here, and even brought the Shogun here once.

character.name: Hanako
character.description: A newcomer to http://anidb.net/ch16984 [Snack Smile] Hostess Club, Hanako`s ambition was to become a dancer, leading her to leave Osaka for Edo, only to get duped by the leader of the Dream Catcher Cult.

character.name: Tomu
character.description: Charlatan cult leader of the Dream Catcher Cult, of which http://anidb.net/ch16985 [Hanako] was a victim of.

character.name: Nishiki Ikumatsu
character.description: Nishiki Ikumatsu is the owner of a ramen shop called Hokuto Shinken (北斗心軒). She and her husband, http://anidb.net/ch17029 [Daigo] intended to turn the ramen shop into the best in Edo, but her husband died due to http://anidb.net/ch6222 [Jouishishi]`s terrorist activities before they could do it, as a result of which she holds a deep grudge against Jouishishi members. http://anidb.net/ch1165 [Katsura Kotarou] worked at her ramen shop when he was injured and on the run from http://anidb.net/ch6221 [Shinsengumi]. He helped to rescue her when her brother-in-law betrayed her. Although she now knows that he is a Jouishishi member, they are on friendly terms. http://anidb.net/ch1165 [Katsura]`s subsequent television interview by http://anidb.net/ch17094 [Hanano Saki] was carried out at her ramen shop. http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Gintoki] is known to be a frequent customer, and he would patronize her shop every time he gets some money from his jobs.

character.name: Gitei
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch17029 [Daigo]`s brother. Real name is unknown.

character.name: Freeter Sentai Shinobi 5
character.description: Working as freelancers, this mercenary group of ninjas called themselves Freeter Sentai Shinobi 5, led by http://anidb.net/ch1675 [Hattori Zenzou].

character.name: Gou
character.description: Also known as Idaten no Gou. Member of the http://anidb.net/ch17072 [Freeter Sentai Shinobi 5], a mercenary ninja group for hire.

character.name: Shuwa
character.description: Also known as Bishamonten no Shuwa. Member of the http://anidb.net/ch17072 [Freeter Sentai Shinobi 5], a mercenary ninja group for hire.

character.name: Wakikaoru
character.description: Also known as Benzaiten no Kaoru. Member of the http://anidb.net/ch17072 [Freeter Sentai Shinobi 5], a mercenary ninja group for hire. Seen operating a flower shop in Episode 97, where Kagura posing as mini-Gintoki crashed the scooter into her shop, damaging the flower-petal birthday present that was planned secretly for Michiko by her husband. As a ninja she uses the flower pollen to paralyze her opponents.

character.name: Matsuo
character.description: Also known as Koumokuten no Matsuo. Mmember of the http://anidb.net/ch17072 [Freeter Sentai Shinobi 5], a mercenary ninja group for hire.

character.name: Sadaharu
character.description: A form in which http://anidb.net/ch1656 [Sadaharu] turns after drinking milk with strawberries.

character.name: Ane
character.description: Twin sister (older) of http://anidb.net/ch17091 [Mone], ex-priestess is now the colleagure and arch-rival of http://anidb.net/ch1169 [Shimura Tae] at http://anidb.net/ch16984 [Snack Smile]. Tendency to act `cute` in front of customers and uses her temple priestess uniform to that effect.

character.name: Mone
character.description: Twin sister (younger) of http://anidb.net/ch17090 [Ane], the ex-priestess. Felt guilty about abandoning http://anidb.net/ch1656 [Sadaharu].

character.name: Komako
character.description: This mini-version of http://anidb.net/ch1656 [Sadaharu] is the defending Inugami aka Dog God, while http://anidb.net/ch1656 [Sadaharu] is the attacking counterpart. When `awakened`, has the ability to transform into a strong ferocious single-horned version just like http://anidb.net/ch1656 [Sadaharu] but still maintaining its mini size. Its eyebrows are typically upside down in relation to http://anidb.net/ch1656 [Sadaharu]`s, although when http://anidb.net/ch1656 [Sadaharu] gets mad, its eyebrows have been known to look like Komako`s.

character.name: Komako
character.description: A form in which Komako turns after drinking milk with strawberries.

character.name: Hanano Saki
character.description: Also known as Hanano Ana, Hanano Saki is a news reporter from Oedo TV who has interviewed characters such as the http://anidb.net/ch10409 [Yorozuya], http://anidb.net/ch1165 [Katsura] etc. She usually attempts to remain positive during her interviews but the frustration caused by the insane inhabitants of the Kabuki District often make her lose her temper, patience and common sense. In the Dragon Palace Chapter, she turned into a senile old woman after suffering the effects of the Tamatebako aging gas while reporting live from the scene.

character.name: Hedoro
character.description: Hedoro is a large, green Amanto, with two white inverted horns and dark eyes with red pupils. He moves in next to the http://anidb.net/ch10409 [Yorozuya] and starts a flower shop (which incidentally gives the whole of Edo hay fever). His appearance completely terrifies Gintoki and friends when he comes over to give a welcome gift (a flower). Although he looks hideous and frightening, he is in reality a peaceful being with a green thumb, who loves all life, particularly plants and insects. In episode 68, it is revealed that he is afraid of ghosts.

character.name: Paruko Tarou
character.description: Elder brother of http://anidb.net/ch17099 [Paruko San Kyoudai].

character.name: Paruko Jirou
character.description: Second brother of http://anidb.net/ch17099 [Paruko San Kyoudai].

character.name: Paruko Sannan
character.description: Third brother of http://anidb.net/ch17099 [Paruko San Kyoudai].

character.name: Kanbee
character.description: Kanbee is a gambler who could read luck with his right eye. A legendary `charisma` gambler, he is also known as Tsukiyomi no Kanbee, tsukiyomi meaning "(luck) easily attaches". He is first encountered by http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Gintoki] and http://anidb.net/ch1655 [Hasegawa] during their losing streak. After discovering that the legendary gambler is cheating, the three are taken prisoner by Kujaku Hime and told to play Mahjong against one of her players. During the match their opponent asks if Kanbee could really read luck to which he recalls the incident in which his eye was damaged. He had to cut his luck-reading right eye deliberately in order to rescue a friend who was held hostage.

character.name: Kada
character.description: Also known as Kujaku-hime Kada (Peacock Princess Kada) is 1 of the 4 Devas of the Kabuki District. A skilled professional gambler herself, she operates most of the gambling outfits in Kabuki District. In Chapter 305, she was revealed to be a member of the http://anidb.net/ch16863 [Harusame].

character.name: Janki Akage
character.description: Parody of http://anidb.net/ch9207 [Akagi], complete with zawa-zawa effects on entry.

character.name: Tatsumi
character.description: An orphan rescued by the the Chief Fireman. The Chief was unable to save her parents in time, and the guilt compelled him to raise Tatsumi as his own daughter. Her ambition to become a fireman like her guardian met with strong opposition from her guardian. When an arsonist went round torching parts of Edo, she hid in trash bins to try and catch him, but mistook http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Gintoki] for an arsonist and roughed him up.

character.name: Atama
character.description: Chief fireman. Real name is unknown.

character.name: Houkama
character.description: Houkama is a pyromaniac. Real name is unknown.

character.name: Honjou Kyoushirou
character.description: Previously known as http://anidb.net/ch17209 [Kuroita Hachirou], before cosmetic surgery. Presently No.1 Host in Kabuki District. Owns/runs his own male host club by the name of http://anidb.net/ch17210 [Takamagahara].

character.name: Hachirou
character.description: Partner of http://anidb.net/ch17208 [Honjou Kyoushirou]. Previously known as Hanako (花子), before cosmetic surgery.

character.name: Dobunezumi Gumi
character.description: Kabuki District yakuza syndicate.

character.name: Doromizu Jirochou
character.description: Big Boss of the Kabuki District yakuza syndicate http://anidb.net/ch17217 [Dobunezumi Gumi]. In Episode 55, his henchmen mentioned that Doromizu Jirochou, used to admire http://anidb.net/ch1653 [Otose], one of the other 4 Devas of Kabuki District.

character.name: Aku no Soshiki
character.description: Evil organization.

character.name: Aoki Shachou
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch17234 [Aoki company] president.

character.name: Murata Tetsuya
character.description: Has hearing problem, speaks like he is shouting. Creator of the bio-mechanical sword Benizakura, with the ability to self-learn from its user.

character.name: Murata Tetsuko
character.description: After her older brother http://anidb.net/ch17237 [Murata Tetsuya] deliberately misled Sakata Gintoki into tracking down the purportedly missing Benizakura, only for him to get seriously injured, Murata Tetsuko felt guilty and finally admitted that she was aware that her brother has manufactured the bio-mechanical sword Benizakura in cahoots with http://anidb.net/ch10407 [Kiheitai], though she did not alert http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Gintoki] to it initially. She came to the injured http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Gintoki] asking for help to stop her brother, and gave him a katana with a coiling dragon emblem on the hilt that on first glance, resembled a pile of poop.

character.name: Murata Jintetsu
character.description: Father of Murata siblings, older son http://anidb.net/ch17237 [Murata Tetsuya] and younger daughter http://anidb.net/ch17238 [Murata Tetsuko]. Renowned as the greatest swordsmith in Edo.

character.name: Mahha Noriko
character.description: Mahha Noriko is a young Amanto who immigrated to Earth from the Express Planet (快速星) to start a job as an "Express Delivery Girl". Her goal is to become the best Delivery Girl in the Galaxy. Members of her species need to stay in constant motion and have the wind in their face, if they stop for even a second they will start coughing up blood and possibly die. Character design was based on drawing of Saitou-san (斉藤さん) from Tokyo, the winner of Amanto Boshuu (天人募集) contest.

character.name: Fuchou
character.description: Head nurse.

character.name: Ochi-san
character.description: Down-trodden ex-white-collar worker, Ochi-san is now the coordinator for the District Test-your-courage Contest seen in Episode 68, and his objective is to make it a roaring success, in order to banish his past failures. Left his family because he was too ashamed of his own failure.

character.name: Meguro Hakase
character.description: An ambitious man who plotted to take over the research institute that http://anidb.net/ch17304 [Professor Hayashi] was in charge of. His own evil plans were however, upset by http://anidb.net/ch17301 [No.502], and was eventually killed by http://anidb.net/ch17301 [No.502].

character.name: Kurin-chan
character.description: A rejected cleaning robotic maid with malfunctioning cleaning ability, i.e. over-cleaning. Her body was subsequently decapitated and recycled by http://anidb.net/ch1678 [Hiraga Gengai] for http://anidb.net/ch7827 [Tama]`s use.

character.name: Go Maru Ni Gou
character.description: A highly intelligent high-tech robot injected with the personality data of http://anidb.net/ch17304 [Professor Hayashi], this model resembles human beings the most. Data corruption led it to stage a coup d`etat to establish a `nation of robotic maids` to accompany his dead daughter whose personality data the living http://anidb.net/ch17304 [Professor Hayashi] has injected into http://anidb.net/ch7827 [Tama]. It was able to think up of the plan to gather all the robots, all the while making use of Professor http://anidb.net/ch17299 [Meguro] to implement it, and even killed http://anidb.net/ch17299 [Professor Meguro] in the end. No. 502 has the ability to regenerate itself no matter what kind of damage it suffers. Its data chip is only 1 micron in size, making it extremely hard to pin-point and destroy. Its arms can turn into long-range sharp weapons which it can manipulate at will, and its eyes have the ability to track and analyze moving targets.

character.name: Hayashi Ryuuzan
character.description: Devastated by the death of his daughter Hayashi Fuyou, widower Hayashi Ryuuzan devoted his life to `resurrecting` his daughter by extracting her personality data and injecting it into robots. Considered a genius scientist by the community, he plotted his own `death` to turn into a robot himself, i.e. http://anidb.net/ch17301 [No.502]. Knowing that his daughter may not live long, he conducted experiments on his own sickly daughter to extract her personality data, which eventually hastened her death. http://anidb.net/ch1678 [Hiraga Gengai], the other inventor genius in Edo, said that their philosophies towards machines are the exact opposite. He said Porfessor Hayashi`s creations are beautiful and intricate, whereas his machines are crude and ugly.

character.name: Hayashi Fuyou
character.description: Sickly daughter of http://anidb.net/ch17304 [Professor Hayashi]. Her mother passed away when she was young, and father decided to make toys to keep her company. These toys eventually evolved in complexity to become robots like http://anidb.net/ch7827 [Tama]. Already frail to begin with, she complied with her father`s request to conduct experiments on her to extract her personality data, which only hastened her death.

character.name: Udo-chan
character.description: Udo-chan is a rejected cleaning robotic maid with malfunctioning cleaning ability, i.e. using too much strength to clean things and not very intelligent. She decapitated a Buddha statue during one of her cleaning jobs and was sent back as a reject. Her cleaning tool of choice is a gigantic mop.

character.name: Last of Mohicans Living of the Dead MacGuffin
Bubbles-oujo
character.description: 3 times the size of the average Amanto, the 3rd generation queen of Planet Gorilla. Due to deteriorated diplomatic ties with Earth, marriage between Commander http://anidb.net/ch1657 [Kondou Isao] and the princess was mooted to improve the diplomatic relationship. During wedding ceremony, which involves consummation of the marriage on the spot, http://anidb.net/ch1657 [Shimura Tae] gatecrashed the party to presumably rescue the minors, namely http://anidb.net/ch1163 [Shimura Shinpachi] and http://anidb.net/ch1164 [Kagura] from having to watch such an act, marriage therefore did not materialize.

character.name: Otaki
character.description: Otaki is a head of housekeeping, to instruct the female members in the household on their household duties. She has tendency to ill-treat juniors / newcomers, e.g. http://anidb.net/ch1169 [Shimura Tae].

character.name: Kanchou
character.description: Dojo master of the dojo at which http://anidb.net/ch1657 [Kondou Isao] was a follower, in Bushuu (武州). His real name is not known.

character.name: Tasuke
character.description: Good-for-nothing son of http://anidb.net/ch16971 [Banzou]. Deemed as `boyfriend` by http://anidb.net/ch16864 [Kimiko] though he dumped her during the hostage negotiation in favour of keeping the drugs he stole from the drug peddling syndicate. Was scolded by father http://anidb.net/ch16971 [Banzou] in his youth for indulging in video games for 2 years instead of working, but when son saw that father was jobless (due to company restructuring) even though he worked so hard, he became disillusioned and turned to illicit `jobs` like drug peddling.

character.name: Kozenigata Heiji
character.description: Kozenigata Heiji is a `hard-boiled` police detective who does not live up to the expectation of his `competent-looking face`.

character.name: Haji
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch17450 [Kozenigata]`s sidekick.

character.name: Omohide Sake no Oyaji
character.description: A seemingly harmless elderly man selling food and drinks in a small outdoor kiosk, which http://anidb.net/ch17450 [Kozenigata] frequents and to whom he typically pours out all his `sorrows` while downing glasses of shochu. http://anidb.net/ch17450 [Kozenigata] insists on calling the shochu `Kamiyu` aka Camus, and addressing the kiosk operator as `Master`, the Japanese term for bar-tender in a higher class pub.

character.name: Kitsunebi no Chougorou
character.description: A thief who wears a fox-mask whom http://anidb.net/ch17450 [Kozenigata] has been pursuing for 20 over years. Also known as 怪盗 狐火の長五郎 (Kaitou Kitsunebi no Chougorou) aka Crazy Bandit Chougorou of Will o`the Wisp (lit.fox-spirit fire) in the past, a 9-member ninja group of bandits, he has since left the group, after saving http://anidb.net/ch17450 [Kozenigata Heiji] (who was still a small kid then), giving him a chest of money and burning down his bandit group`s hideout to distract them.

character.name: Kai

character.name: Cat`s Punch

This is actually a cameo of Yoshida Kouji (吉田幸司), the other real-life Jump Editor for Death Note (complete series) and D.Gray-man.

character.name: Shinohara Shinnoshin
character.description: Like http://anidb.net/ch1658 [Yamazaki], Shinohara Shinnoshin is a http://anidb.net/ch6221 [Shinsengumi] Intelligence Agent aka Spy, but he is allied with http://anidb.net/ch1661 [Itou Kamotarou]`s camp, vs. http://anidb.net/ch1658 [Yamazaki] for http://anidb.net/ch1657 [Kondou]`s camp.

character.name: Amarao Daisaku

character.name: Mashiroi Kaguzou
character.description: Father of Mashiroi Utsuzou. Leader of Mashiroi Kumi (魔死呂威組), a gangster or yakuza organization. A very proud man, he hired the http://anidb.net/ch10409 [Yorozuya] to retrieve his son from the store room instead of admitting his approach with his son may have been wrong. Despite this he cares for his son greatly and commands the respect of many of his followers despite his age and illness.

character.name: Sakata Gintoki

character.name: Rurimaru

He takes a personal interest in Hasegawa`s collection of porn DVDs, and confiscates them as "dangerous goods" to be left in his "safe keeping".

character.name: Chourou

character.name: Kintoki

character.name: Chinkasu

character.description: Kuzunoha is one of Seimei`s shikigami. She is named after Kuzunoha (葛の葉), the mother of the historical Abe no Seimei.

character.name: Teishoku-ya no Oyaji

character.name: Furui Bakufa
character.description: The Old Bakufa was a government controlled by Tendoushuu with the help of Tokugawa Sadasada, using his nephew, Tokugawa Shigeshige as a figurehead.

character.name: Tendoushuu
character.description: The Tendoushuu are a group of Amanto that not only control large parts of Gintama`s universe but are the true rulers of Earth with their main base of operations in Edo, Japan. The series establishes early on that they are the main villains in the story who influenced many of the actions and lives of most protagonists and antagonists. Source: http://gintama.fandom.com/wiki/Tendoshu

episode.title: 何事も最初が肝心なので多少背伸びするくらいが丁度よい
Jump Festa Anime Tour 2005 Special
Nanigoto mo Saisho ga Kanjin na no de Tashou Senobi Suru Kurai ga Choudo Yoi
episode.summary: This special is a set of short comedy stories involving Gintoki and his equally-broke sidekicks Shinpachi and Kagura. One day, Gintoki and his comrades are out viewing the spring flowers when suddenly the Shinsengumi appear, arguing that Gintoki has taken their flower-viewing spot. Gintoki`s team and the Shinsengumi must then battle for the right to sit in that spot by using a violent version of rock paper scissors.

episode.title: てめーらァァァ!!それでも銀魂ついてんのかァァァ! (前編)
You Jerks! And You Claim to Have Gintama?! (Part 1)
Temeeraaaa!! Soredemo Gintama Tsuiten no kaaaa! (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Long ago, this nation was known as the land of the samurai. The dream-filled Edo skies, upon which the samurai once gazed, are now filled with the ships of the Amanto, beings that suddenly invaded and rose to power. And now these arrogant aliens walk the streets of the city. The samurai have lost their swords, status, and even their honor… In this city former samurai Gintoki Sakata runs the Odd Jobs business. One day he receives a visit from a client named Katoken. To regain something he has lost, Katoken needs 30 million ryo—a lot of money. After listening to Katoken’s endless tale of misfortune, the Odd Jobs trio feels obliged to help out. Meanwhile, the Amanto Kariya and his men gather to plot the takeover of Edo city Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: てめーらァァァ!! それでも銀魂ついてんのかァァァ! (後編)
You Jerks! And You Claim to Have Gintama?! (Part 2)
Temeeraaaa!! Soredemo Gintama Tsuiten no kaaaa! (Kouhen)
episode.summary: Gintoki manage to escape Shishimura’s sudden attack. Regrouping with Kagura and the others, he finds that their client Katoken was unable to stick with the training and has left. Gintoki finds Katoken drowning in his sorrows alone and joins him for a drink to share his wisdom: “No matter how much you try, you cannot escape from what you truly wish to forget.” Hearing those words, Katoken explains the reason behind his wanting to become stronger. Gintoki decides to lend a hand to help Katoken regain his most important treasure. Together with Kagura and Shinpachi, they march into the Drift Star Embassy… only to find themselves welcomed by a mountain full of food. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天然パーマに悪い奴はいない
Nobody with Naturally Wavy Hair Can Be That Bad
Tennen Perm ni Warui Yatsu wa Inai
episode.summary: The arrival of the Amanto has forced the samurai to throw away their swords. But Shinpachi’s father lived by the way of the sword, never losing his samurai honor. With his dying breath, the father entrusts his two children with the samurai spirit. To protect the dojo left behind by his father, Shinpachi works hard at jobs he’s not used to doing. But to a boy who knows only swordsmanship, the world is not a kind place. When Shinpachi is ridiculed by his manager and laughed at by the Amanto, one man stands up to confront them. Shinpachi sees an honest samurai within the man as he pounds down the manager and wipes out the Amanto for ruining his chocolate parfait. Yes, this man is in fact Gintoki Sakata, also known as “Odd Jobs Gin.” The Last Samurai with naturally wavy hair for a trademark?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ジャンプは時々土曜にでるから気をつけろ
Watch Out! Weekly Shonen Jump Sometimes Comes Out on Saturdays!
Jump wa Tokidoki Doyou ni Deru Kara Ki o Tsukero
episode.summary: Half a month has passed since Shinpachi began working for Odd Jobs Gin. Unable to see in Gintoki the glowing samurai spirit he felt, Shinpachi is already regretting his decision. One day as Gintoki and Shinpachi ride double on their scooter, a girl suddenly jumps in front of them. Unable to stop, Gintoki runs over the girl. Gintoki rushes the injured and unconscious girl toward the hospital, when suddenly a black car blocks the way and opens fire. While Gintoki and Shinpachi panic, the girl regains consciousness and blocks the bullets and wipes out the attackers with her built-in gun umbrella. There’s a reason the yakuza are after her, and Shinpachi decides to help the girl escape. However… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Gintama Promo
ジジィになってもあだ名で呼び合える友達を作れ
Make Friends You Can Call by Their Nicknames, Even When You`re an Old Fart
Jijii ni Natte mo Ada Na de Yobiaeru Tomodachi o Tsukure
episode.summary: The staff of Odd Jobs Gin is going about their usual daily bickering when a delivery scooter crashes into the Otose Snack House downstairs. Barely conscious, the postman begs the Odd Jobs Trio to deliver an important package in his place. Gintoki and the others reluctantly head to the address on the package, Embassy of Inui, the Dog Star system. But the package explodes, and the trio are mistaken as terrorists. The three attempt a hasty escape, but when Shinpachi is caught, he decides to take Gintoki and Kagura down with him, and the gatekeepers quickly corner the three. Just when everybody thinks they are done for, they are saved by Gintoki’s old acquaintance Kotaro Katsura, aka Zura. Secretly observing the whole incident, the government’s police force, the Shinsengumi, decides to make their move… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一度した約束は死んでも守れ
Keep a Promise Even If It Kills You
Ichido Shita Yakusoku wa Shinde mo Mamore
episode.summary: Although their actions result in saving everyone from Katsura’s bomb, Gintoki and the group are nonetheless held for police questioning. Convinced Odd Jobs Gin are behind the bombing, the police continue their interrogation, when Shinpachi, who was staring at the clock the whole time, finally snaps. Baffled by his raging fit, the police finally let the trio go. Ignoring Gintoki and Kagura who vent their resentment in front of the police station, Shinpachi leaves the scene in a hurry. Left behind, Gintoki and Kagura come across an escaped convict being chased by the police. The man takes Kagura hostage and orders Gintoki to take the wheel in the police car. When asked by Gintoki why he ran away the man answers, “Because today is a special day…” Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ペットは飼い主が責任をもって最後まで面倒をみましょう
Responsible Owners Should Clean Up After Their Pets
Pet wa Kainushi ga Sekinin o Motte Saigo Made Medou o Mimashou
episode.summary: Midland Star Prince Hata’s pet Pes disappears, and the Immigration Bureau, though resentful of the Amanto’s orders, ask Odd Jobs Gin to look for the missing pet. Hearing that the client is an Amanto, the Odd Jobs at first turn down the offer but quickly change their minds when they are presented with a stack of cash. So begins Gintoki and group’s hunt for the pet. Looking for any kind of lead, the group makes the rounds of the octopus fisherman at the piers, takoyaki stores, and bars, but Pes is nowhere to be found. With few options left, Gintoki brings out his ultimate weapon. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 粘り強さとしつこさは紙一重
There Is but a Fine Line Between Persistence & Stubbornness
Nebari Tsuyosa to Shitsukosa wa Kamihitoe
episode.summary: While the Shinsengumi strive to maintain peace in the city of Edo, their commander Kondo is busy sulking in front of Otae, who now works at a snack bar. Depressed, Kondo calls himself a good-for-nothing. Otae gently smiles and tells him that she would love a man for his whole self, including his weaknesses. With those words, Kondo falls in love with Otae and asks her to marry him, but receives a knock-out punch instead. Undaunted, Kondo uses all sorts of means to show his affection for the immovable Otae. Finally having enough of it, Otae drags Gintoki into the situation, but things take an unexpected turn… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 喧嘩はグーでやるべし
Fighting Should Be Done with Fists
Kenka wa Guu de Yarubeshi
episode.summary: From Hijikata to Okita, and Okita to the Shinsengumi, news quickly spreads of the commander losing in battle for a woman, stirring up commotion within the squad. To make matters worse, Kondo’s miserable loss is aired on TV, forcing Hijikata to figure out some way to gain back the Shinsengumi’s dignity. To do so, they must eliminate the silver-haired samurai who defeated Kondo. Hijikata joins the other members to search for Gintoki in town. Meanwhile, oblivious of single-handedly earning the Shinsengumi’s malice, Gintoki is yanked away to help with his client’s carpeting job. While the whining Gintoki helps out the client, the Shinsengumi closes in…. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 疲れたときは酸っぱい物を
Eat Something Sour When You`re Tired
Tsukareta Toki wa Suppai Mono o
episode.summary: Prince Hata makes yet another visit to Edo. Heartbroken over the loss of Pes, the prince goes through every Edo city zoo determined to find the next cutest pet. Meanwhile, savoring her pickled seaweed, Kagura comes across a box left in front of the Odd Jobs Gin building. Her face lights up with a big smile when she finds an adorable animal in the box. The animal is a slightly…no, VERY big dog-like creature. Despite Gintoki’s protests, Kagura insists on keeping it. Kagura names the dog Sadaharu and plays rough with it, while Gintoki and Shinpachi grow exhausted from Sadaharu’s constant biting. What will Gintoki and Shinpachi do? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: コスプレするなら心まで飾れ
If You`re Going to Cosplay, Go All Out
Cosplay Suru Nara Kokoro Made Kazare
episode.summary: Odd Jobs Gin receives a job to look for a missing person, the daughter of a distinguished government official who hasn’t returned home in days. Reluctantly accepting the client’s wish to settle the case quietly, the Odd Jobs Trio goes to gather information at a club where the girl was often sighted. Unable to get any useful leads and tired of looking, Kagura tries to nab a man who looks similar to the girl, when the man’s condition suddenly changes. According to a waiter, a weird drug is floating around this district. Meanwhile Gintoki is alone in the men’s room recovering from a massive hangover when somebody calls to him over the door. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: べちゃべちゃした団子なんてなぁ団子じゃねぇバカヤロー」, 第
Look, Overly Sticky Sweet Dumplings Are Not Real Dumplings, You Idiot!
Bechabecha Shita Dango Nante naa~ Dango ja nee~ Bakayaroo~
episode.summary: Gintoki and Kagura visit Shinpachi in the hospital after a car accident. Even in the hospital the Odd Jobs Trio is noisy as usual. An old man in the next room overhears their conversation and asks for their help. He requests that they look for a woman from the old man’s bittersweet memories. The only lead they have is a kanzashi, and that the kanzashi’s owner worked at a Dango shop. The Odd Jobs Trio begin their search but find that nobody seems to remember the Dango shop, and they quickly reach a dead-end. Kagura tries having Sadaharu trace the scent from the kanzashi, and the place Sadaharu leads them to is not at all what they expected… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 第一印象がイイ奴にロクなやつはいない
People Who Make Good First Impressions Usually Suck
Daiichi Inshou ga Ii Yatsu ni Roku na Yatsu wa Inai
episode.summary: One night Otose, the landlord of Gintoki’s Odd Jobs, comes across a starving cat-eared Amanto named Catherine in the back alley and hires her to work at the Otose Snack House. Otose comes to take a liking to the hard-working and considerate Catherine. The Odd Jobs Trio on the other hand find themselves under a tighter budget and constant hunger thanks to Kagura’s hearty appetite. Meanwhile, a string of robberies occur in the downtown district. One day, the police make a visit to the Otose Snack House to gather any information regarding the recent robberies. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 男にはカエルに触れて一人前, みたいな訳の分からないルールがある / 脇だけ洗っときゃいいんだよ脇だけ
You Only Gotta Wash Under Your Armpits / Just the Armpits
Otoko ni wa Kaeru ni Sawarete Ichininmae Mitai na Wake no Wakaranai Ruuru ga Aru / Waki Dake Arattokya Iindayo Waki Dake
episode.summary: Thanks to Gintoki and Katsura, the space pirates ship is brought down. Several antiforeigner factions use this opportunity to take down high government officials who profited from their illegal drug collusion with pirates and Amantos. The Shinsengumi is ordered to provide protection for the officials. Kondo unquestioningly carries out his duty, claiming that if it weren’t for the government the Shinsengumi wouldn’t be where it is today. But the members cannot hide their frustration toward the corrupt Amanto and government officials. Amidst all of this, Kondo is shot down by the antiforeigner faction, taking the hit intended for a frog Amanto they were assigned to protect. Just when the Shinsengumi’s frustration is about to explode, they hear Hijikata shouting… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 飼い主とペットは似る
Pets Resemble Their Owners
Kainushi to Pet wa Niru
episode.summary: Gintoki finds himself forced into looking after Sadaharu and is soon exhausted. That’s when Katsura shows up with a peculiar creature. Seems this thing is a gift from the space merchant Sakamoto and is called Elizabeth. Gintoki is surprised at the fact that Katsura, who supposedly hates space creatures, would keep such a pet. Then Gintoki and the gang learn that a TV show is looking for weird animals to appear on their show. Blinded by the grand prize given to the winner, Gintoki and the gang decide to participate. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人生ってオッさんになってからの方が長いじゃねーか! 恐っ!!
If You Stop and Think About It, Your Life`s a Lot Longer as an Old Guy Than a Kid! Whoa, Scary!!
Jinseitte Ossan ni Natte Kara no Hou ga Nagai ja nee ka! Kowa!!
episode.summary: Kagura sees Hasegawa wasting his time at the park in broad daylight and asks what he’s doing. Since he was fired from the Immigration Bureau after punching Prince Hata on a passing whim, Hasegawa now walks down the path of a Dumb Old Retarded Kook, DORK for short. Ordered by his superior to commit seppuku, Hasegawa returns home to pack up and skip town only to find his wife has already left, saying she can’t deal being with a DORKH (Dumb Old Retarded Kook Husband). Having lost everything, the only friend Hasegawa has now is Gintoki, whom he met at the pachinko parlor. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 親子ってのは嫌なとこばかり似るもんだ
Sons Only Take After Their Fathers` Negative Attributes
Oyakotte no wa Iya na Toko Bakari Niru Mon da
episode.summary: The Kabukicho Neighborhood Association, led by Otose, marches toward the doorstep of Edo’s No. 1 inventor, Gengai Hiraga. The association has had it with Gengai’s noisy building of useless junk. Recruited by Otose, the Odd Jobs Trio fights sound with sound by blasting music from their karaoke machine but are stopped by the sudden appearance of the robot Saburo. The Odd Jobs Trio then proceed to relocate Gengai’s workshop to the nearby riverbank, only to end up breaking Saburo and the other robots created by Gengai, who were to perform for the shogun at the upcoming festival. Meanwhile a dangerous man has set foot into Edo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ああ やっぱり我が家が一番だわ
Oh, Yeah! Our Crib Is Number One!
Aa Yappari Wagaya ga Ichiban da wa
episode.summary: Shinpachi returns home with a gift for his sister—a doll that oddly resembles Elizabeth, with the name “Space Monster Stefan” printed on its chest. But what awaits Shinpachi is a deadly naginata swing by the raged Otae. While Shinpachi narrowly dodges the attack, Stefan falls prey to the naginata. As she tears Stefan apart, Otae explains the reason behind her fit. It appears the panty thief who’s recently been stirring things up in Edo city stole her panties. To soothe her sister’s anger, Shinpachi decides to ask for help from Gintoki. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 海の水がなぜしょっぱいかだと? オメーら都会人が泳ぎながら用足してくからだろーがァァ!!
Why`s the Sea So Salty? Because You City Folk Pee Whenever You Go Swimming!
Umi no Mizu ga Naze Shoppai ka da to? Omeera Tokaijin ga Oyoginagara Youzoku Shitekukara Darou gaaa!!
episode.summary: There are men who try to earn an easy buck by settling their hopes on pachinko, only to fail miserably. Regretting their decision, Gintoki and Hasegawa are sucking on their ice candies bought with the dropped change they collected, when they overhear something about a moneymaking opportunity. A reward has been placed on a space creature that’s been haunting the beach. Gintoki and Hasegawa propose to fish out the alien and grab the reward, and the Odd Jobs gang head out to the beach. But what awaits them there is a deserted beach and an old man making yakisoba noodles at the beach house. And the reward in fact turns out to be… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ベルトコンベアには気をつけろ
Watch Out for Conveyor Belts!
Belt Conveyer wa Ki o Tsukero
episode.summary: One hot summer night, as mosquitoes fill the air, the Shinsengumi immerse themselves in sharing scary tales. Inayama tells the tale of a female ghost dressed in a red kimono haunting the schoolhouse at midnight, only to find that the same ghost has appeared in the Shinsengumi station as well! More than half of the team falls victim to the ghost, each muttering about a woman dressed in red. Frightened by the unseen danger, Kondo decides to hire an exorcist to handle the situation. But these exorcists seem awfully shady-looking. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 男ならとりあえずカジキ! / 扇風機つけっぱなしで寝ちゃうとお腹こわしちゃうから気を付けて
If You Go to Sleep with the Fan On, You`ll Get a Stomachache, So Be Careful
Otoko Nara Toriaezu Kajiki! / Senpuuki Tsukeppanashi de Nechau to Ohara Kowashichau Kara Ki o Tsukete
episode.summary: Amidst a summer heat wave with no air conditioning, the Odd Jobs office quickly turns into a steam house. When Gintoki and Kagura fight over and break the Senpuki (fan), their only means of dealing with the heat, Gintoki reluctantly heads out to buy a new one – only to run into extreme difficulties. Every store tells him they no longer sell an obsolete product like the fan and recommends buying an AC instead, which is beyond Gintoki’s budget. Finally, Gintoki comes across a recycled goods shop called the “Earth Defense Army Base.” Upon entering the store, he finds himself embroiled with the female store owner’s battle to protect the “Senpuki (???)"…?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 結婚とは勘違いを一生し続けることだ
Marriage Is Prolonging an Illusion for Your Whole Life
Kekkon to wa Kanchigai o Issho Shitsuzukeru Koto da
episode.summary: One morning Shinpachi makes his usual commute to the Odd Jobs to wake up Gintoki when he comes across an unbelievable sight. Right inside Gintoki’s room, sleeping next to him is a woman dressed in a kunoichi outfit! As she mixes some natto, the woman named Sachan tells Gintoki that that the two made a vow the night before to become husband and wife, even though the hung-over Gintoki has no recollection of what happened. Thus, the Odd Jobs are forced to let Sachan stay at their place as an unwelcome wife. Just when everyone thinks Ginotki’s unhappy days have begun, a single call for Sachan drastically changes matters…. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 困ったときは笑っとけ笑っとけ
When You`re in a Fix, Keep On Laughing, Laughing...
Komatta Toki wa Warattoke Warattoke
episode.summary: Returning with the groceries, Kagura puts on a sudden arrogant attitude that is understandably justified - She won a trip to space at the local big-sale raffle! Without a moment of hesitation the Odd Jobs trio head off to the Space Port. Unfortunately Sadaharu cannot join as they are told no pets are allowed on board. Insisting on bringing Sadaharu with her, Kagura starts arguing with the staff while Sadaharu goes off to harass a man with shades sleeping at the departure lobby. Curiously, the man disappears into the crowd without noticing the giant animal biting at his head. Carrying the Odd Jobs trio, the space ship sets off, but a group calling themselves the “Moe Fighting Sprits” shows up to hijack the ship… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カワイイ顔には必ず何かが隠れてる
Cute Faces Are Always Hiding Something
Kawaii Kao ni wa Kanarazu Nanika ga Kakureteru
episode.summary: Mademoiselle Saigo: one of the Four Royals of Kabukicho and a girly man known as the “demon.” After calling this person a freak, Gintoki ends up being forced to cross-dress and work at the “Girly Boy Club” run by him (her?). At the club Gintoki comes across Katsura, who is also dressed as a woman. Katsura protests that he is merely waiting for the right moment to escape, but no matter how Gintoki looks at it, Katsura seems to have completely blended in with a life surrounded by girly men. One day the two encounter Saigo’s son Teruhiko, who is being bullied. Seeing that the boy is troubled, Katsura tries to console him, but…? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鍋は人生の縮図である
A Shared Soup Pot Is a Microcosm of Life
Nabe wa Jinsei no Shukuzu de Aru
episode.summary: Gintama is celebrating its half-year run on the air! And so the Odd Jobs trio attempts to kill some time by airing some re-caps. But their true intentions are to draw away the others’ attention and eat as much meat as possible from the sukiyaki meal before them. Trying to read each other’s next moves, Gintoki and Shinpachi successfully trick Kagura and chow down, only to spill the pot all over the place. Realizing she’s been tricked, Kagura begins arguing with Gintoki. Amidst this gloomy atmosphere Shinpachi believes that in order to avoid another messy tragedy, it is imperative to secure the meat’s safety first. And at that moment another pot challenger arrives… with the battle for meat taking yet another turn for the chaotic. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恥ずかしがらずに手を挙げて言え
Don`t Be Shy: Just Raise Your Hand and Say It
Hazukashigarazu ni Te o Agete Ie
episode.summary: On Hasegawa’s request the Odd Jobs trio take his place to work at the Oedo Mart Convenience store for the day, but Kagura and Gintoki’s half-baked attitudes cause nothing but trouble for the customers. The only one who’s working seriously, Shinpachi cannot help but sigh at his friends’ incompetence when he notice a punk trying to shoplift some goods. When Shinpachi catches the thief, he realizes it is Takachin, his childhood friend back from temple school. Ever since the day Shinpachi betrayed his trust, Takachin became a target for bullying. But now Takachin claims to be feared since joining a team called the “Bulldogs.” To save his friend from walking down the wrong path, Shinpachi breaks into the “Maltese” gathering. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 刀じゃ斬れないものがある
Some Things Can`t Be Cut with a Sword
Katana ja Kirenai Mono ga Aru
episode.summary: At the Women’s Wrestling Arena Shinpachi roots for Otsu the fighting idol, Kagura gets all excited and storms into the ring, and Gintoki watches his friends in shame. Okita also happens to be there, and leads the trio down to the slums where they discover an underground coliseum called the “Rengokukan.” Investigating the high authorities’ support for these death matches, Okita points out Kidomaru, Rengokukan’s deadliest fighter in a demon mask, suggesting the Odd Jobs may find out something from following him. The gang scouts Kidomaru’s house, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: いい事は連続して起こらないくせに悪い事は連続して起こるもんだ
Good Things Never Come in Twos (But Bad Things Do)
Ii Koto wa Renzoku Shiteokoranai Kuse ni Warui Koto wa Renzoku Shiteokorumon da
episode.summary: On the morning astrology program Ms. Ketsuno declares with a smile that “Virgos with goatees who are brushing their teeth right now will die today...” Kondo, who was watching the show while brushing his teeth, can’t help but let out a wry sigh when Matsudaira thunders in, blasting away with his gun – the Shinsengumi’s involvement with the Rengokukan has come to light, and both are summoned to the castle. Baffled by Hijikata and Okita’s impulsive actions, Kondo enters a state of panic after learning he may be assassinated before arriving at the castle. Matsudaira, who now sees everything as possible assassins, summons Sachan as a counter measure to assassins. Hence the dangerous drive to the castle begins... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 慌てるな! クーリングオフというものがある / テレビとか新聞とかちゃんと見ないとダメだって
Don`t Panic: There`s a Return Policy! / I Told You to Pay Attention to the News!
Awateruna! Cooling-off to Iu Mono ga Aru / Television to ka Shinbun to ka Chanto Minai to Dame Datte
episode.summary: Part 1: “Star Destroyer,” the enchanted sword that can even cut through stars – searching for this legendary weapon, one man goes on a sword hunt night after night. The man’s name is Gankeimaru, an Amanto training to become the strongest warrior, and he has come to Earth in search of the ultimate weapon worthy of his strength. Meanwhile Gintoki and Shinpachi learn that Kagura has been buying massive amounts of products from the shopping channel, and tells her to return them all. Upset from having all her items confiscated, Kagura comes up with an idea after spotting Gintoki’s wooden sword. It’s just the start of another messy situation... / Part 2: Kagura’s scream stirs up the Odd Jobs office. The cause? A cockroach! Thinking it’s an average cockroach, Gintoki and Shinpachi head out to kill it, only to retreat back on all fours. Why? Because it turns out to be a giant-sized cockroach! Around the same time, the TV reports multiple infestations of giant cockroaches throughout Edo city, and Prince Hata advises NOT to kill these Space Cockroaches, as it will attract more of them. Oblivious to such warnings, the Odd Jobs gang are about to exterminate the giant creature when it starts to scream... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アイドルだってほぼお前らと同じことやってんだよ
Even Teen Idols Act Like You Guys
Aidoru Datte Hobo Omaera to Onaji Koto Yattenda yo
episode.summary: Newcomer Idol Tsu Terakado and Boy Band “Hansamu” leader Goemon’s passionate affair revealed! – The news plunges Shinpachi and the fan club members into the depths of depression. Gintoki is also stunned after learning that his favorite weather reporter Ms. Ketsuno is married. But while Kagura smirks at the two losers, Otsu shows up at the Odd jobs office. Since the discovery of the relationship, Otsu has received numerous threatening letters and has come for Gintoki’s help, but she has no clue as to who the culprit is. Shinpachi is determined to protect Otsu with all his might by staying close to her... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: どうでもいいことに限ってなかなか忘れない
You Always Remember the Things That Matter the Least
Doudemo Ii Koto ni Kagitte Nakanaka Wasurenai
episode.summary: Gintoki finds himself lying on the ground, witnessing the blue sky gradually changing into red. Losing consciousness at the spot, Gintoki is rushed to the hospital. Turns out while on his way to buy Jump magazine on his bike, Gintoki was hit by a car driver who was talking on his cell phone. Shipnachi and the others rush to the hospital to see the now-conscious Gintoki, but learn he has no recollection of his own self… In order to somehow return the now honest and likable Gintoki back to his “dullish” personality, Shinpachi and Kagura take him back to the Odd Jobs office. But despite their efforts there are no signs of his memory returning. To find other possible events that may trigger his memory, the Odd Jobs wander through the streets of Edo but… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人生はベルトコンベアのように流れる
Life Moves On Like a Conveyor Belt
Jinsei wa Belt Conveyer no You ni Nagareru
episode.summary: Two weeks have passed since Gintoki declared the disbanding of the Odd Jobs business and disappeared into the streets of Edo. Kagura sit and eats her pickled seaweed alone inside the ruined Odd Jobs office, which was destroyed by a spaceship. When Shinpachi comes to pick her up, Kagura tells him that she will not give up until Gintoki returns with his memories. Meanwhile Shinsengumi intelligence agent Yamazaki has infiltrated the Mamushi Factory where he finds some unexpected faces – The amnesic Gintoki and Kondo! Working diligently with a lively look on his face, Gintoki is now the building specialist for the “Jastaway.” But after the Jastaway explodes, Gintoki gets mixed up in another mess… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人の名前とか間違えるの失礼だ
Mistaking Someone`s Name Is Rude!
Hito no Namae to ka Machigaeru no Shitsurei da
episode.summary: Having recovered from his amnesia, Gintoki attempts to renegotiate his overdue rent with Otose in celebration of his life starting anew. Instead, Otose cold-heartedly declares that unless the destroyed Odd Jobs office is repaired within a week, she will kick him out. Having no other choice, the trio try their hands on doing some unaccustomed carpenter work, but the task proves to be too difficult for the three amateurs. Irritated, Kagura and Gintoki lose control and create further destruction, when they receive a package sent by Sakamoto. Inside they find a letter, along with two little men. The two claims to be portable carpenters and begin rebuilding the Odd Jobs office… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恋にマニュアルなんていらない
Love Doesn`t Require a Manual
Koi ni Manual Nanteiranai
episode.summary: Members of the Otsu fan club are having a heated debate on the train about Otsu’s popularity being jeopardized by the appearance of TAMA, the cat-eared idol. After learning that fan club members are “cheating” with TAMA, Shinpachi delivers an iron-fisted punishment, which accidentally saves a girl who was being harassed by a drunken Matsudaira – and the girl turns out to be cat-eared! Shinpachi instantly falls for her cute looks, but panics after being asked out on a date by the girl, who is named Eromesu. Shinpachi tries to deal with the situation by asking for help on a web message board, but this only leads to further problems as the day arrives for his fateful date… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 外見だけで人を判断しちゃダメ
Love Doesn`t Require a Manual (Continued) / You Can`t Judge a Person by His Appearance, Either
Soto Midake de Hito o Handanshicha Dame
episode.summary: Matsudaira summons Kondo, Hijikata, and Okita to the Ikedaya and informs the three of them that “You-know-who” is finally making his move. As tension runs high in the room, Matsudaira further declares it’s time for a “showdown.” Kondo and the others pledge their assistance to Matsudaira without really knowing whom this “You-know-who” is. When they find themselves at the amusement park and see a flirtatious man named Shichibei meet Kuriko, Matsudaira’s daughter, they realize Matsudaira is plotting to assassinate the man toying with his beloved daughter. Appalled by all of this, Hijikata decides to leave, but Kondo and Okita join in on the gig. And so begins the dramatic yet sad battle of men on a stake-out, ready to break up a couple’s date. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: すねに傷がある奴ほどよくしゃべる
People with Dark Pasts Can`t Shut Up
Sune ni Kizu ga Aru Yatsu Hodo Yoku Shaberu
episode.summary: Finishing up their night job, Otae and Oryo walk home under the morning sunlight. While casually badmouthing their customers the two witness Hanako, the new kid at their bar, attempting to throw herself off a bridge. Otae quickly stops her and brings her home, where she learns the deeply troubled Hanako left her hometown of Osaka in order to become a dancer. Hanako then explains how she spent all her savings after joining the Dream Faith – a weird religious cult that promises to grant the power to make dreams come true. The Odd Jobs go undercover with Hanako’s help, but… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サンタなんていねーんだよって言い張る奴こそホントはいるって信じたいんだよ / 煩悩が鐘で消えるかァァ 己で制御しろ己で
People Who Say That Santa Doesn`t Really Exist Actually Want to Believe in Him / Prayer Won`t Make Your Worldly Desires Go Away! Control Yourself
Santa Nante Ineen da Yotte Iiharu Yatsu Koso Honto wa Irutte Shinjitaindayo / Bonnou ga Kane de Kieru kaaa Onore de Seigyoshiro Onore de
episode.summary: On his way back from buying Nikuman one snowy night, Gintoki comes across an old man dressed in red and a reindeer arguing. Gintoki offers his help after hearing Santa complain of being unable to finish his job after his sled was destroyed. When Gintoki brings a two-wheeled cart instead, Santa whine over how it needs to be a sled to preserve his reputation. But after being talked down by Gintoki, Santa ends up making his deliveries dressed in all black. And so begin the burglar-like Santa and Reindeer, AND Gintoki’s night of delivering dreams to the kids. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雪ではしゃぐのは子供だけ / 冬に食べるアイスもなかなかオツなモンだ
Only Children Play in the Snow / During Winter, Eating Ice-Cream Is Sweet
Yuki de Hashagu no wa Kodoma Dake / Fuyu ni Taberu Ice mo Nakanaka Otsu na Mon da
episode.summary: Heavy snow falls upon the city of Edo. Otose’s voice rings through the winter wonderland, signaling the start of the Kabukicho Snow Festival! The highlight of the festivities is a snow figure-building contest with grand prize money. Entering the contest for the money, the Odd Jobs trio builds a snow figure claiming to be the “Neo Armstrong Cyclone Jet Armstrong Cannon.” Despite Shinpachi’s protests, everyone who visits the sculpture compliments its perfection. But Gintoki and Kagura, concerned over the other contestants’ works, begin sabotaging other snow figures. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: メニューが多いラーメン屋はたいてい流行っていない
Ramen Shops with Long Menus Never Do Well
Menu ga Ooi Ramen ya wa Taitei Ryuukoutte Inai
episode.summary: While trying to force his way out of a Shinsengumi inspection, Katsura is hit by Okita`s bazooka and injures his leg. He tries to escape by running across roofs, but he is mistaken for an underwear thief and is defeated by Ikumatsu, the owner of the ramen shop, Daigo Ramen. The next morning, Ikumatsu serves him ramen to apologize for the misunderstanding. While Katsura eats, Ikumatsu`s brother-in-law noisily enters the shop with his henchmen. The atmosphere turns volatile, and sensing Ikumatsu`s uneasiness, Katsura chases out the unwanted guests. Katsura learns from Ikumatsu and her brother-in-law`s conversation that Ikumatsu is a widow and that the Joi Faction is responsible for her husband`s death. Thus an emotionally scarred man and woman begin a strange life together… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 子作りは計画的に
Give a Thought to Planned Pregnancy
Kozukuri wa Keikaku Teki ni
episode.summary: While Edo is abuzz with talk of the movie Alien vs. Yakuza, a real alien has snuck into Edo from outer space. Kondo gets a tip from renowned alien buster Umibozu and has the Shinsengumi set up a cordon. Meanwhile, Kagura has fallen for an “it`s me” scam, which is causing a sensation in Edo. Kagura obediently follows instructions given by a man claiming to be Gintoki and rushes off to the bank. Unfortunately, the alien also happens to be at the same bank. Worried about Kagura, Gintoki and Shinpachi also arrive at the bank. But Kagura, who is being swallowed by the alien, catches the two and tries to bring them down together. At that very moment, Umibozu appears before the bunch. Kagura is stunned to see him… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: タイトルだけじゃ映画の面白さはわかんない
You Can`t Judge a Movie by Its Title
Title Dake ja Eiga no Omoshirosa wa Wakannai
episode.summary: Fired by Gintoki, a depressed Kagura sits in the boarding area at the terminal with her father Umibozu. When he hears that Gintoki fired Kagura, Shinpachi lashes out and tells Gintoki to think of how much the Odd Jobs and Gintoki meant to Kagura. With that, Shinpachi announce to quit the Odd Jobs as well. Meanwhile, Kagura’s spaceship is about to take off. In the cargo hold, Prince Hata’s servant, Jii, has ordered that the prince’s cargo be organized, but the maintenance crew is terrified of the creepy cargo. Jii ends up breaking a vial, which is the beginning of an incident that will toss Edo into chaos… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: みみずにおしっこかけると腫れるよ
You Know What Happens If You Pee on a Worm
Mimizu ni Oshikko Kakeru to Hareru yo
episode.summary: The alien continues to wreak havoc at the terminal when Gintoki appears on the scene with Sadaharu, only to be engulfed by the alien`s tentacles. Meanwhile, Umibozu finds Kagura fallen and injured after her attempt to save Prince Hata and Jii. Enraged, Umibozu seizes the two when Kagura stops and tells how proud she was of using her powers to save someone. The alien attempts to capture Kagura with its tentacles. Just as the alien is about to swallow her, Gintoki and Sadaharu come charging out of the alien`s mouth. Gintoki and Umibozu insult each other as they join forces to fight the alien. Meanwhile, in the sky, a Shogunate Battleship led by Matsudaira has appeared! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キャラクターはシルエットだけで読者に見分けがつくように描き分けよう
Make Characters So Anybody Can Tell Who They Are by Just Their Silhouettes
Character wa Sillhouette dake Dokusha ni Miwake ga Tsuku You ni Agakiwakeyou
episode.summary: Umibozu leaves but Kagura decides to stay in Edo. Seeing her friends sitting pensively in the Otose Snack house, Kagura, feeling mischievous, spies on the bar from the outside. But soon her friends forget about their loneliness and move on to different topics: Gintoki`s crotch, beautiful women doctors, and the personalities of the female characters on the show… Soon talk centers on who will be the new heroine to fill in the Odd Jobs roster. Sachan, Otae, and Catherine begin a fierce battle over the slot. Who will the men choose to be the next heroine…?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: お母さんだって忙しいんだから夕飯のメニューに文句つけるの止めなさい
Mom`s Busy, Too, So Quit Complaining About What`s for Dinner
Okaasan Datte Isogashiindakara Yuuhan no Menu ni Monku Tsukeru no Tomenasai
episode.summary: An evil magistrate named Chintaro Toyama captures Elizabeth. When Katsura bribes the Odd Jobs with food to save her, our heroes naturally accept.
