Recruiting the help of Sachan (after getting her fired from her job at a kunoichi café), the rescue team, a.k.a. Go-Ninja Spy Force, sneaks into the magistrate`s office. But the Shinobi Five, led by Zenzo Hattori, stands in their way. Zenzo is still bitter about his scuffle with Gintoki over a Jump comic on New Year`s Eve, while Sachan faces Kaoru, her rival from ninja school. Shinpachi, Kagura, and Katsura defeat their opponents with curry laced with a laxative, but things get dangerous when Kagura carelessly takes a bite of the curry… And then things get even crazier as Gintoki and Zenzo get into a heated debate about the “Pegasus Meteor Slash” pose, and Kaoru`s poison rose perfume attack goes off … Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 愛犬の散歩は適度なスピードで
Walk Your Dog at an Appropriate Speed
Aiken no Sanpo wa Tekido na Speed de
episode.summary: One night, Gintoki comes back home after a long night of carousing, and sees that Sadaharu has become enormous. Gintoki and his crew are at a loss as to what caused this sudden growth, and the dog translation device that Gintoki got at the bar isn`t of any use. To make things worse for the bewildered threesome, Sadaharu gets even bigger, and when Sadaharu is shown on TV, Edo is thrown into an uproar. Curious bystanders barge into the Odd Jobs office, throwing rocks and injuring Kagura. Upon seeing this, Sadaharu… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ××遊びは20歳になってから
Adults Only. We Wouldn`t Want Anyone Immature in Here
XX [Chome Chome] Asobi wa 20-Sai ni Natte Kara
episode.summary: In order to pay off the damages for Sadaharu`s rampage, Ane not only has to let go of her savings but her shrine as well, and goes to work at Cabaret Smile. She is able to have her way with men and becomes the shop`s drawing card. But she doesn`t get along with Smile`s other featured employee, Otae. The two clashes with each other, and when Otae beats up Ane`s main customer, the owner of Kikuya, Smile`s manager lays down a resolution. He`s going to fire the person who has the least total sales the following day. A ruthless battle between women is about to begin! But that night, Otae tells Ane that she`s not going to compete. However, this might be Otae`s first attack--! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さくらんぼってアレ桜の木になるの?
Do Cherries Come from Cherry Trees?
Sakuranbotte Are Sakura no Ki ni Naru no?
episode.summary: Gintoki and the gang are suffering from the mother of all hay fevers. One theory suggests the cause is a plant from a far-off planet, but no facts are available, and when Otose is forced to close her shop due to hay fever, it becomes apparent this is a serious situation. One day a new resident named Hedoro moves in to Kabukicho, and the Odd Jobs crew learn that the menacing-looking Amanto runs a flower shop right next to their office. When it turns out that all the pollens are originating from the shop, the Odd Jobs suspect Hedoro is trying to weaken the population with hay fever and take over the world. And then the trio find themselves having to deliver a circular to Hedoro… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 似てる二人は喧嘩する 何であれやるからには負けちゃダメ
The More You`re Alike, the More You Fight / Why Do You Use That Useless Negativity?
Niteru Futari wa Kenka Suru Nande Are Yaru Kara ni wa Makecha Dame
episode.summary: The Shinsengumi capture one of the three Parco Brothers’ allies and the brothers go after Hijikata in retaliation. The youngest brother waits for Hijikata`s day off and sit next to Hijikata in a restaurant, preparing to strike, but the sight of the Hijikata Special, a bowl of rice topped with mayonnaise, and the Uji Gintoki-Don, a bowl of rice topped with a large helping of azuki beans, leads to an argument between Hijikata and Gintoki, and an unexpected knockout of the youngest Parco brother. The three Parco Brothers withdraw, but they haven`t given up on Hijikata yet. Little do they know that they will be drawn into Gintoki and Hijikata`s fierce battle of pride… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ギャンブルのない人生なんてわさび抜きの寿司みてぇなもんだ
Life Without Gambles Is Like Sushi Without Wasabi
Gamble no Nai Jinsei Nante Wasabi Nuki no Sushi Miteena Mon da
episode.summary: Gintoki and Hasegawa visit a casino in an attempt earn some easy cash but before long they’ve lost everything and are stripped down to their loincloths. The two complain that they can`t win because evil spirits possesses them. But when a renowned gambler named Kanbe, the Luck Reader, arrives on the scene and helps them get their clothes back, Gintoki and Hasegawa take a hint from his suaveness, and try their hands at blackjack, only to wind up getting their clothes taken away again. Kanbe helps the two yet again, and after hearing his story Gintoki and Hasegawa learn the source of his luck… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 未定は未定であって決定ではない
Undecided Is Undecided and It`s Not a Decision
Mitei wa Mitei de Atte Kettei Dewanai
episode.summary: Anime Gintama enters its second year on air! Well, more like manages to slide by for a second year. Either way it’s the second season, as the Odd Jobs crew reflect on “securing a one-year slot on air” and reminisce about the many events that occurred in the past year. As expectations of high ratings have given way to many hardships, Gintoki suggests that something needs to be done as the series continues on... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ミルクは人肌の温度で
Milk Should Be in the Temperature Like Human Skin
Milk wa Hitohada no Ondo de
episode.summary: A baby is left on the doorstep of the Odd Jobs office with a message that says, “It`s your baby.” The baby has naturally curly silver hair and dead-fish eyes… in other words, the baby looks exactly like Gintoki, and everyone besides him believes without a doubt that the baby is his love child. Shinpachi, Kagura, and Otose all become smitten by the baby named Kanshichiro. Panicked over the idea of Kanshichiro really beng his child, Gintoki flees the Odd Jobs office with the baby. But with no one willing to listen to his side of the story, Gintoki is at a loss. Meanwhile, Kahei Hashida, the owner of a large financial combine, visits the Odd Jobs. Kahei wants the Odd jobs to find Ofusa, the woman who kidnapped his grandson Kanshichiro. But Otose senses something fishy… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人に会うときはまずアポを
Make an Appointment First Before Meeting With Someone
Hito to Au Toki wa Mazu Appo(intment) o
episode.summary: Kahei is questioning the captured Ofusa about the whereabouts of baby Kanshichiro. When Shinpachi and Kagura, who are being chased by Nizo, come rushing in. Despite the commotion Kahei continues with his interrogation. Kagura makes a smoke screen while Shinpachi tries to save Ofusa, but Nizo is blind and smoke screens don`t work against him. The group ends up getting cornered. Meanwhile, Gintoki visits the Hashida residence with Kanshichiro, but he is unable to talk to the Kihei, the company president, because he doesn`t have an appointment. While Nizo corners Shinpachi and the others, Gintoki and Kanshichiro manage to get past the receptionists and onto an elevator… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ストレスはハゲる原因になるがストレスをためないように気を配るとそこでまたストレスがたまるので結局僕らにできることなんて何もない
Stress Causes Baldness. But, Paying Too Much Attention to Preventing Stress, Builds Up Stress Again. In the End There Is Nothing That We Can Do to it.
Stress wa Hageru Genin ni Naru ga Stress o Tamenai You ni Ki o Kubaru to Sokode Mata Stress ga Tamaru no de Kekkyoku Bokura ni Dekiru Koto Nante Nani mo Nai
episode.summary: Kabuki-cho has been plagued with a series of arsons. To prevent anyone from setting fire to garbage, rules about separating garbage have become stricter, so when Gintoki tries to sneak out magazines with the combustible garbage Otose sees him and gives him a lecture. But she unwittingly starts a small fire with a tossed-off cigarette, and when a panicky Gintoki tries to put the fire out, a young female fire fighter named Tatsumi sees him and mistakes him for the arsonist. Fortunately he’s cleared of any charges, but the leader of the fire fighters, who acts as Tatsumi`s father, shuns her, claiming that a woman cannot be a fire fighter. Even so, Tatsumi wants to become the best fire fighter in Edo and catch the arsonist, which interests Gintoki… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: どこの母ちゃんもだいたい同じ
Mothers Are the Same No Matter Where They Are
Doko no Okaasan mo Daitai Onaji
episode.summary: A mother suddenly barges into the Odd Jobs office, wanting them to find her son Hachiro, who disappeared after coming to Edo. Though perplexed by the mother’s excessive concern, Gintoki and the gang begin their search for Hachiro. Using a photograph as a clue, they discover that Hachiro has undergone many plastic surgeries. They draw hair and a mustache on the photo for fun and a man named Hachiro who looks exactly like the man in the photo passes them by. Gintoki and the others are sure that this man is the Hachiro they`re looking for, and bring Hachiro and his mother together, but… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: もの食べるときクチャクチャ音をたてない
Do Not Make That "Kuchakucha" Sound When Eating
Mono Taberu Toki Kuchakucha Koto o Tatenai
episode.summary: Katsuo knocks Hachiro out and makes unreasonable demands of Kyoshiro, which Gintoki and the others oppose by acting as hosts. Kyoshiro stubbornly refuses Katsuo`s demands, and in response, Katsuo points a dagger at him as a warning, but Gintoki intervenes. Katsuo and his men leave because Katsuo`s favorite dog gave birth. Hachiro`s mother hears about the birth and follows them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一日局長に気を付けろッテンマイヤーさん
Take Note of the One-Day Director
Ichinichi Kyokuchou ni Ki o Tsukerottenmaiya-san
episode.summary: Edo is in an uproar about the serial kidnappings of women. The Shinsengumi goes overboard in cracking down and sees a sudden drop in their public image. Kondo invites pop idol Tsu Terakado to be chief for the day in order to call on Edo residents to prevent crimes, as well as to boost the Shinsengumi`s image. Otsu is eager to do her duty and begins reforming the Shinsengumi, beginning with the bureau`s regulations. The Odd Jobs Trio are asked by Otsu to accompany her dressed up as the uninspiring mascot character Makoto-chan. The Shinsengumi realizes who they are and a fight breaks out. While they fight, someone kidnaps Otsu. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 無くした物を探すときはその日の行動をさかのぼれ
You Must Go Back to the Day of Action When You Were Looking for Lost Items
Nakushita Mono o Sagasu Toki wa Sono Hi no Koudou o Sakanobore
episode.summary: Mutsu`s Pleasure Support Club tries to deliver batteries so powerful that one can power a space battleship to Aoki and Co. But a group of men dressed in black shows up and steals the batteries and the money. Mutsu asks the Odd Jobs to recover the batteries and the money and capture the Pleasure Support Club’s missing leader, Sakamoto. Gintoki and the others easily capture Sakamoto and go to Aoki and Co., but find no clues. Gintoki and the others are forced to go along with Sakamoto`s plan to go out gallivanting and drinking. As they totter down the night road, heading home, a group sneaks up behind them. Gintoki and Sakamoto realize the danger they`re in and reminisce about the past as they confront their attackers. Sakamoto fires a gun and bluffs the enemy into retreating so no one gets hurt. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 売店ではやっぱコロッケパンが一番人気
Croquette Bread Is Always Popular in Shops
Uriden Dewa Yappa Croquette Pan ga Ichiban Ninki
episode.summary: Elizabeth comes to Yorozuya, but Katsura, who is always with her, isn`t there. Gintoki and the others are unsure how to treat Elizabeth. She doesn`t talk and is difficult to figure out. Shinpachi decides to serve her tea, but Elizabeth doesn`t react. He tries to serve her coffee next, but her attitude doesn`t change at all. Kagura decides to serve her a certain drink as a last resort. Upon being served that drink, Elizabeth quietly begins to shed tears! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 傘の置き忘れに注意
Do Not Forget Where You Left Your Umbrella
Kasa no Oki Wasure ni Chuui
episode.summary: Kagura has snuck onto a suspicious ship where she fights Takasugi under the bright moonlight. Kagura senses an odd presence and is attacked from behind. She escapes Matako Kijima’s double pistols, but Henpeita Takechi is waiting for her with the ronin he leads. Kagura wreaks havoc, but in the confusion of battle, Matako hits her with a gunshot. Even though her shoulder and leg have been injured, Kagura fights on. Finally, she gets within the ship. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 陽はまた昇る
The Sun Will Rise
Hi wa Mata Noboru
episode.summary: The Katsura’s Faction launches a midair battle against Takasugi to avenge Katsura, who was attacked by Nizo the Butcher. Nizo fights back with Benizakura, a sword-shaped weapon that has become fused with his arm. Meanwhile, Henpeita Takechi and Matako Kijima have captured Kagura. Shinpachi sneaks on board Takasugi`s ship and uses the confusion of a cannon shot to successfully save Kagura. Meanwhile, Gintoki is headed to Takasugi’s ship along with Tetsuko, the younger sister of Tetsuya, the creator of the Benizakura. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 闇夜の虫は光に集う
Insects at Night Gather in the Light
Yamiya no Mushi wa Hikari ni Atsumau
episode.summary: Gintoki and Nizo battle to the death on the deck of Takasugi`s ship. The anti-battleship weapon Benizakura has infiltrated Nizo`s mind, driving Nizo out of control. Gintoki fights back with a sword forged by Tetsuko. Nizo attacks with overwhelming strength, but slowly, the battle begins to turn in Gintoki`s favor. Meanwhile, within the ship, Takasugi plans to use the Benizakura to overthrow the shogunate, but he is confronted by Tetsuya, the man who forged the Benizakura, Tetsuya`s younger sister Tetsuko, and Katsura. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ミイラ捕りがミイラに
What You Want Is Not What You Get
Miira Tori ga Miira ni
episode.summary: Hijikata receives a report from Shinsengumi inspector Yamazaki about the struggle between the Katsura Faction and Takasugi Faction. Included is information on sightings of people who appear to be the Jacks-of-all-trades in the riot. Hijikata suspects that Gintoki has connections with the Antiforeigner Faction, so he orders Yamazaki to investigate Gintoki`s affairs. Yamazaki questions Gintoki`s friends, but he isn`t able to get anything out of them. At his wit`s end, Yamazaki ends up visiting the Jacks-of-all-trades. The Jacks-of-all-trades are out, but he gets information that Gintoki is receiving medical treatment at Shinpachi`s house. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ジャンプの次号予告は当てにならない
The Preview of the Next Edition of Jump Is Unreliable
Jump no Jigo Yokoku wa Ate ni Naranai
episode.summary: Ninja Zenzo Hattori runs through the city at night. His job requires him to be on time and fulfill his clients` requests perfectly. The job: pizza delivery. One night, as Zenzo is about to land, Gintoki crashes his scooter into Zenzo`s backside. Ignoring the pain of his hemorrhoids, Zenzo grabs the pizza box to make his delivery. But instead of the pizza box, Zenzo accidentally grabs Gintoki`s Jump. Zenzo`s client, Okuni, takes the Jump and tells Zenzo that misfortune will befall his rear and that he should be careful. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: んまい棒は意外とお腹いっぱいになる
Eating Corn Is Unexpectedly Very Filling
Nmaibou wa Igai to Onaka Ippai ni Naru
episode.summary: Katsura, who is secretly a member of the Joi Faction, is visited by a reporter from the talk show The Edo. Katsura tells reporter Hanano that he wants the citizens to know about the work that the Joi Faction has done and think about what they can do for the country. Led by Okita, the Shinsengumi barges in, and Katsura is forced to run. He takes out a corn potage-flavored Nmaibo from his kimono and shows it to the Shinsengumi, explaining that he carries it around as emergency rations. The Shinsengumi continue to pursue him, and Katsura throws the Nmaibo onto the roof. The Nmaibo acts as a smoke screen, and Katsura and his group manage to escape. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 少年はカブト虫を通し生命の尊さを知る
The Boy Learns the Value of Life Through the Beetle
Shounen wa Kabuto Mushi o Tooshi Inochi no Tattosa o Shiru
episode.summary: Stag beetle wrestling has become popular in Edo. Kagura enters Sadaharu 28, a dung beetle that she is fond of, into a competition. But Okita of the Shinsengumi barges in and defeats Kagura with his jumbo stag beetle. Meanwhile, Gintoki learns that stag beetles can be sold at high prices and plans to go to the forest to catch some. Kagura says that she wants to catch a stag beetle to avenge Sadaharu 28. The group heads to the forest, but they find the Shinsengumi already there, desperately looking for stag beetles … Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 華より団子
Substance over Form
Hana Yori Dango
episode.summary: Gintoki is stuffing himself with dango at Konpeito, a quiet dango shop. The shop`s customers have been lured away by the sweets shop Andromeda, which is across the street. The owner persists in promoting his shop with his enthusiasm for dango. Gintoki learns that Sweets, the owner of Andromeda, is trying to drive Konpeito out of business because he wants the land. Konpeito`s owner won’t agree to Sweets’ proposition, so Sweets challenges him to a competition. Konpeito and Andromeda will invite people to eat dango, and the shop whose dango is most popular wins. The loser has to close up shop. Konpeito`s owner is hesitant, but Gintoki has a plan. The match begins! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 走り続けてこそ人生 / 理想の彼女はやっぱり南ちゃん
This Life That Continues to Run / Minami-chan Is Indeed the Ideal Girlfriend
Hashiri Tsuzukete Koso Jinsei / Risou no Kanojo wa Yappari Minami-chan
episode.summary: Gintoki gets robot puppeteer Gengai Hiraga to fix his bike. But when Gintoki tries to leave Gengai`s shop without paying the repair bill, Gengai activates the modification he had secretly made. Gintoki loses control of his scooter and crashes it into another scooter belonging to Amanto express messenger Noriko Mach. Now Noriko is injured and unable to ride her bike. But it turns out she has a special physical condition. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 渡る世間はオバケばかり
There Are Ghosts to Be Found Everywhere
Wataru Seigen wa Obake Bakari
episode.summary: It is the day of a festival, but Gintoki and the others head to the temple grounds. Kagura complains that she wants to enjoy the festivities, but Gintoki tells her that they have to take over someone`s shift. Ochi, a man dressed up as a fallen samurai with an arrow in his head, appears before them. He manages the haunted house at the festival. Gintoki and the others have come to help him. Ochi tells them about how he was unappreciated by those around him, how he was downsized, how his wife left him, and how his only reason for living is running a haunted house splendidly. Gintoki and the others become concerned for him and try to help, but… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゴミの分別回収にご協力下さい
Please Separate Your Garbage
Gomi no Bunbetsu Kaikyuu ni Gokyoryoku Kudasai
episode.summary: Gintoki tosses out his magazines on the day for combustible garbage pickup. Scared off by a terrifying commercial, Gintoki goes back to retrieve his magazines, but passes out after seeing a woman`s severed head at the dumping ground. The next day, Gintoki wakes up in his room and is relieved when he thinks it was just a dream, only to find the severed head in Kagura`s hands. Shinpachi informs the panicked Gintoki that it’s the head of an Etsuko, a popular mechanical maid. Gintoki and the others are unable to get a body for the bodiless Etsuko when they hear breaking news. Professor Hayashi, the Etsuko`s creator, has been killed, and there is a warrant out for Fuyo, his prototype mechanical maid . Fuyo`s characteristics match that of the head that Gintoki and the group have… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 可愛いモノも多すぎると気持ち悪い
Cute Things Become Disgusting When There Are Too Many
Kawaii Mono mo Oosugiru to Kimochi Warui
episode.summary: Gintoki and the gang are suddenly attacked by maids and split up into two groups. Gintoki and Kagura act as decoys to draw away the enemy maids, while Shinpachi takes Tama to Gengai. Tama tells Shinpachi that he has a 5 percent chance of surviving and suggests that he should leave her and run away. But Shinpachi tells her that a samurai protects the person they have sworn to protect no matter what. His words stir a mysterious sensation within Tama that she was not programmed to feel. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 消せないデータもある
There Is Data That Cannot Be Deleted
Kesenai Data mo Aru
episode.summary: Gintoki and the others rush to Number 502, who plans to take control of Edo with machines. They head to the terminal in Gengai`s tank. Gengai and the tank are lost in an attack by a giant maid. Gintoki parts ways with Kagura and Sadaharu, and heads further in with Fuyo. Gintoki and Fuyo finally confront 502. 502 tries to welcome Fuyo as a reincarnation of his daughter, but Fuyo refuses. Obeying the words of late Professor Hayashi to give his daughter a smile, she tries to destroy 502, who has gone out of control! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: かもしれない運転でいけ / 犬の肉球はこうばしい匂いがする
Let`s Drive There / Doggy Meatballs Have a Fragrant Smell
Kamoshirenai Unten de Ike / Inu no Nikudama wa Koubashii Nioi ga Suru
episode.summary: Katsura is reporting the shogunate`s recent activities at a salon where Joi faction members gather. But the faction members are only interested in talking about the latest popular drama and don`t listen to what he says. Katsura becomes angry and leaves the salon. He proceeds to a video rental store. When he tries to rent a video, the store employee asks him to show his driver`s license as identification, but as a fugitive, he doesn`t have a license. Meanwhile, Gintoki has gone to a driving school to take lessons after having his license suspended. When he gets into a passenger seat as part of a joint exercise with the other students, he finds Katsura in the driver`s seat! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: そんなに松茸って美味しいもんなのか一度よく考えてみよう
The Mushrooms Are Delicious
Matsutakette Oishii Mon na no ka Ichido Yoku Kangaete Miyou
episode.summary: The Odd Jobs gang has gone to the mountains to go hunting for matsutake mushrooms. Gintoki is in high spirits, but a hunter named Marinosuke appears before him and warns him to leave the mountain quickly because it`s dangerous. But Gintoki and the others don`t listen and are intent on finding matsutake mushrooms. Masamune, a giant bear that`s being controlled by a space mushroom, appears before the group! Gintoki and the others escape thanks to Marinosuke. They try to fight Masamune to collect a reward. But a mushroom just like the one controlling Masamune is growing out of Gintoki`s head!! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仕事のグチは家でこぼさず外でこぼせ! って言うからちょっとこぼさせてもらうけどね「侍の国」僕らの国がそう呼ばれていたのは今は昔の話... とか言って始まったこのアニメもはや一年半, あんな事こんな事いろんな事があったよね, で, そろそろ色々振り返ってもいいかなーと思ったのに「チェッなんだよ総集編かよ, 手抜きじゃね?」とか, アニメだって作るの大変なんだから文句言うのやめなさい!

Someone Said "Don`t Complain About Your Job at Home, Do It Somewhere Else" So Let Me Complain. It`s Already Been a Year Since This Anime, Which Began with, "Last of the Samurai. The Days When Our Country Was Called That Are Long Past." A Lot of Things Have Happened Since Then. So I Thought, It Might Be a Good Time to Look Back, but Then Someone Said, "Tsk, a Recap Episode. Isn`t That Slacking?" Look It`s Hard Work Putting Together an Anime, So Stop Complaining!

Shigoto no Guchi wa Ie de Kobasazu Soto de Kobose! Tte Iu Kara Chotto Kobasasete Moraukedone "Samurai no Kuni" Bokura no Kuni ga Sou Yobareteita no wa Ima wa Mukashi no Hanashi... to ka Itte Hajimatta Kono Anime mo Haya Ichinen Han, Anna Koto Konna Koto Irunna Koto ga Attayone, de, Sorosoro Iroiro Furikaette mo Ii Kana - to Omotta no "Chee Nanda yo Soushuuhen ka yo, Teneki Ja ne?" to ka, Anime Datte Tsukuru no Taihen Nan Dakara Monku Iu no Yamenasai!
episode.summary: Despite the danger of being canceled, Gintama has reached its second year. Gintoki claims that they were able to overcome it through manipulation, but Shinpachi reveals that they were almost canceled because of that. The Odd Jobs keep talking on and on and discover something terrible. They used up half a year`s worth of their production money on the episodes up to now! They decide to look back on the past 75 episodes, but for some reason, the theme song is Otsu`s “Your Mother is a XX.” Thinking it a bad idea to change the theme song, they put out a Prince Hata version of the opening sequence. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 漫画家は原稿のストックが出来てこそ一人前
A Mangaka Has to Stock Up Enough Drafts to Be Qualified
Mangaka wa Genkou no Stock ga Dekite Koso Hitorimae
episode.summary: One day, Kagura and the others notice that Catherine`s eyebrows are on the verge of connecting. While the group is watching a report about an accident nearby where a truck fell over on its side, Catherine comes back and her eyebrows have connected. Catherine becomes violent for some reason and attacks Otose. When things settle down, Otose`s eyebrows are also connected! Gintoki and the others run away from the strange incident. Then they notice that people with connected eyebrows are attacking people all over the place. Edo is placed under emergency alert, and people are forbidden from touching people with connected eyebrows. A great tragedy is descending upon Edo… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: そういう時は黙って赤飯
Quietly Cook Red-Bean Rice at This Time
Sou Iu Toki wa Damatte Sekihan
episode.summary: One night, Hijikata visits the Smile Snack House. He ignores the girls making a fuss over him and designates Otae to be his host. He has a request—he wants her to act like Kondo`s wife and destroy his arranged marriage. The person that Kondo is set to marry is the third princess of planet Orangutan. She looks exactly like a gorilla. Continually dumped by Otae, Kondo is at his limit and might accept the marriage. If he does, the Shinsengumi would have to respectfully call a gorilla(-like woman) “sister.” Other Shinsengumi members appear and beg desperately, but their begging is in vain, and Otae beats them up. Then, a dashing samurai comes to see Otae. His name is Kyubei Yagyu, and he is Otae`s childhood friend… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 昨日の敵は今日もなんやかんやで敵
Yesterday`s Enemy Is Also Today`s Enemy
Kinou no Teki wa Kyou mo Nanyakanya de Teki
episode.summary: Kyubei declares that he`s going to take Otae as his wife. Shinpachi is confused by the sudden turn of events, but he remembers Otae`s tears as they separated and charges into the Yagyu mansion with Kondo! Gintoki, Kagura, Hijikata, and Okita come to help. A fierce battle against the Great Four Yagyu and Kyubei begins!! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 食べ物の好き嫌い多い人は人間の好き嫌いも多い
A Person Who`s Picky with Food Is Also Picky with Humans.
Tabemono no Sukikirai ga Ooii Hito wa Ningen no Sukikirai mo Ooii
episode.summary: Okita and Kagura break through the front lines and clash with Nishino, a large man who`s one of the Great Four. But Okita and Kagura are on bad terms and end up hurting each other. Kagura injures her right hand and Okita injures his right leg. The two decide to cooperate rather than lose and take on Nishino once more by piggyback! Meanwhile, a battle between Hijikata and Kitaoji begins at a dinner table. Hijikata`s sharp fighting intuition becomes a handicap. He becomes cornered by Kitaoji, who makes use of feints. But Hijikata is used to battle, and slowly he adapts himself to his opponent`s fighting style and shows his true power!! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 四人揃えば, いろんな知恵
If There`s Four People, It Is a Lot of Knowledge
Yonin Soroeba Ironna Chie
episode.summary: Upon seeing Minato`s defeat of Okita, Tojo, the leader of the Great Four, finally makes his move! Kyubei goes along with him to the battlefield. As the battle shows signs of intensifying, Kondo and Gintoki are already in terrible danger in the bathroom. They finished doing their business, but they have no toilet paper! Furthermore, Tojo has appeared before their stalls. They are like rats in a trap!! What is the fate of these two men who have run out of toilet paper?!! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 普段眼鏡をかけてる奴が眼鏡を外すとなんかもの足りない パーツが一個足りない気がする
A Person That Wears Glasses Suddenly Takes the Glasses Off, It Feels Like Something Is Missing. Like the Part of the Person Is Missing.
Fudan Megane o Kaketeru Yatsu ga Megane o Hazusuto Nanka Mono Tarinai Parts ga Ikko Tarinai Ki ga Suru
episode.summary: After Kondo and Tojo`s battle, Gintoki and Binbokusai`s battle finally begins! Gintoki struggles against the monkey-like agility of Binbokusai, the strongest member of the Yagyu Family. Meanwhile, Shinpachi has charged into the mansion and has finally found Otae. He tells her everyone`s feelings, but Otae stubbornly rejects them. What happened between her and Kyubei? The final battle to settle the many grudges between the Yagyu clan and the Kodokan members is about to begin!! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 女の一番の化粧は笑顔
A Woman`s Best Make Up Is the Smile
Onna no Ichiban no Keshou wa Egao
episode.summary: Kyubei`s harsh past is revealed, and Otae finally reveals her true feelings to Gintoki and the others. The Kodokan members defeat the Great Four Yagyu and gather one by one. Finally, the final showdown between Gintoki and Shinpachi and Kyubei and Binbokusai finally begins. Shinpachi gets back the glasses he had lost and overwhelms Kyubei. Binbokusai`s quick wits get Gintoki in danger! Neither side will back down in this fierce battle. The conclusion of the battle between the Yagyu clan and the Kodokan members finally comes! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 固ゆで卵は潰れない
Hard-Boiled Egg Won`t Get Crashed
Katayude Tamago wa Tsuburenai
episode.summary: Chogoro Kitsunebi sends a message announcing his next crime! His target is the golden deep-fried tofu statue on display at the Oedo Art Museum. The police are determined to stop the crime to maintain the dignity of the magistrate. “Kitsunebi has become just another burglar. I`ll catch him myself,” Kozenigata says. Kozenigata, who has been chasing Kitsunebi for over ten years, goes to the scene of the crime along with the Odd Jobs trio, despite the fact that he`s on house arrest. Gintoki and the others try to force their way into the heavily guarded art museum. But at that moment, Kitsunebi appears and throws everything into confusion… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 男は心に固ゆで卵
Hard-boiled Egg on a Man`s Heart
Otoko wa Kokoro ni Katayude Tamago
episode.summary: Heiji Kozenigata enjoys being a hardboiled detective. His day is always filled with hardboiled happenings… One night, Heiji goes after his sworn nemesis, the great criminal Chogoro Kitsunebi, whom he has been chasing after for ten years. But during his chase he is stopped by the Odd Jobs gang, letting the Kitsunebi gets away. Forced to take responsibility for his continuous failure to capture the Kitsunebi, Heiji is placed under house arrest. Gintoki and the gang respond to the news by...? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運に身分は関係無い
Rank Has Nothing to Do With Luck
Un ni Jibun wa Kankeinai
episode.summary: A cold is spreading at the Smile Snack House, and most of the hostesses have taken sick leave. An important customer is coming the next day, but Otae is the only one at the shop in good health. Desperate to round up some hostesses, the store manager asks Gintoki and the gang to bring in some cute girls. But everyone aside from Kagura is unenthusiastic about it. Just then, Kyubei comes in to the shop with refreshments for Otae. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ラーメンのために並ぶんじゃない. 自己満足のために並ぶんだ / カワイイを連発する自分自身をカワイイと思ってんだろお前ら
It`s Not Like I Line Up for Ramen. I Line Up for Satisfy Myself.
Ramen no Tame ni Narabunjanai. Jikomanzoku Tame ni Narabunda.
episode.summary: Hamiko, the daughter with a history of serving the shogunate, has come to Gintoki and the bunch to ask them to do a job for her once again. Hamiko says that she`s completely quit "Paradise" because of the Harusame incident. But something terrible is happening to her boyfriend, Tasuke. Tasuke, a "Paradise" dealer, has decided to quit his organization and live an honest life with Hamuko. But when he learns the secret about "Paradise" not only can he not quit, but he is chased by Amanto from the organization as well… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 私と仕事どっちが大事なのとかいう女にはジャーマンスープレックス
Use German Suplex on Women Who Like to Ask Which Is Important, Me or Work
Watashi to Shigoto Docchi Daiji na no Toka Iu Onna ni wa German Suplex
episode.summary: Mitsuba’s fiancé Kuraba turns out to be a corrupt merchant who sells illegally obtained weapons to the Joi Faction members. Wishing for her sister’s happiness, Okita tries to overlook Kuraba’s crime. But as the Shinsengumi, Hijikata must expose Kuraba. As their mixed emotions build up, the rift between the two widens. In the midst of this turmoil, Mitsuba’s condition takes a sudden turn for the worse after being hospitalized. Okita, Gintoki, and Kondo rush to the hospital, but Hijikata continues to keep a look out for Kuraba. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 羊数えるの自体に夢中になったりして結局眠れない事も多い
There Are Many Instances Where You Cannot Get to Sleep Even After Counting Sheep
Tsuji Kazoeru no Jitai ni Muchuu ni Aattarishite Kekkyoku Nemurenai Koto mo Ooi
episode.summary: Mitsuba, Okita’s older sister, pays a visit to the Shinsegumi headquarters to announce her marriage. The squad members are shocked to see Okita’s change in attitude when in front of Mitsuba. The two spend some time together for the first time in years. Mitsuba, who has always looked after her younger brother since he was little, is worried if Okita is doing fine in the Shinsengumi. In order to reassure his sister, Okita introduces his “best friend” Gintoki to Mitsuba, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 二度あることは三度ある
When There`s Two, There Will Be Three
Nido Aru Koto wa Sando Aru
episode.summary: One morning, Gintoki, Shinpachi and Kagura wake up in darkness. “Wake up,” a voice in their heads says. The three are unable to understand the situation and go back to sleep. “Release your inner power,” the voice persistently tells them. But Gintoki and the others ignore it and stay fast asleep. Offended by their rude behavior, the owner of the voice shows himself. Amazingly, it is Lake Toya, the immortal who lives within Gintoki`s wooden sword! The immortal tells them that he will teach them powerful secret techniques. In response, the three… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 合コンは始まるまでが一番楽しい
The Start Is Always the Happiest in Joint Parties
Goukon wa Hajimaru Made ga Ichiban Tanoshii
episode.summary: Ever since the Kodokan feud, Kyubei has completely opened up to Otae and has regained her cheeriness. Tojo has secretly been trying to help Kyubei find her happiness as a woman, but all his efforts go down in vain. Furthermore, he finds something terrifying in Kyubei`s room. Gintoki and the gang console Tojo and decide to hold a speed dating to help make Kyubei more feminine. The groups work to gather participants to participate in the date, but… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 美味いものほど当たると恐い / 銀さん透明人間になるの巻
It`s Scary to Eat the Wrong Food When It`s So Delicious
Oishii Mono Hodo Ataru to Kowai
episode.summary: While attracting customers for a cabaret club, Madao, a completely hopeless man, is hospitalized after being hit by a runaway car. After his repeated misfortunes, what saved the dispirited Hasegawa was Miss Uchino and her devoted caring. Wanting to somehow show his appreciation before leaving the hospital, Hasegawa notices that Uchino has been acting odd the past several days. It seems she has fallen in love with one of her patients. With some help from Gintoki and the gang, who are hospitalized in the same room after some food poisoning, Hasegawa attempts to help Uchino’s love succeed, but… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: やせたいなら動け 食べるな
If You Want to Slim Down, Go and Exercise, Do Not Eat
Yasetai Nara Ugoke Taberuna
episode.summary: Kagura has gotten fat because of her recent degenerate lifestyle. She goes to Otae for advice, but Otae has also gotten fat from eating too much ice cream. Satchan laughs at the both of them for becoming fat, but she has also gotten fat… The three spurred to do something about their situation. They join a famous fasting dojo in town. There they run into Otose, Catherine, and even Kyubei… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人の短所を見るより長所を見つけられる人になれ
Become a Person Who Is Able to Find a Person`s Merits Rather Than His Weak Points
Hito no Dansho o Miru Yori Chousho o Mitsukerareru Hito ni Nare
episode.summary: An assassin known as the Turtle is a self-proclaimed coward. He never lets his guard down, and is never overconfident. He makes various plans, and when he`s confident he`s safe, he gets his target… The Turtle gets a job. His target is Bakufu police chief, Katakuriko Matsudaira. The Turtle has been watching him for 6 months. The day when he sets his plan into action finally comes. The Turtle places his finger on the trigger of his favorite gun which he has carefully taken care of, and waits for his target. The person who appears is not Matsudaira, but Gintoki. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヒーローだって悩んでる
Even Heroes Have Their Own Problems
Hero Datte Nayanderu
episode.summary: Valentine`s Day has come. The girls throughout Edo are buying up chocolate. Odd Jobs guys say that they`re not interested in Valentine`s Day, but Gintoki and Shinpachi are both dressed up fashionably for the occasion. Suddenly, a giant chocolate falls from the sky. The chocolate is from Space Woman, a superhero who fights for Justice in space. Everyone thinks that it is odd for a superhero to partake in Valentine`s Day. It seems that Space Woman has a something weighing on her mind… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 銀さん線撮りになるの巻 / 電車に乗るときは必ず両手を吊り革に
When You Are Sitting on the Train, Both Hands Must Be Strapped
Densha ni Noru Toki wa Kanarazu Ryoute o Tsurikawa ni
episode.summary: Hasegawa finally gets a job. Because of that, he is thinking of restoring his relationship with his wife who is separated. There`s one thing that worries him. While he is talking on the phone with Hatsu, he hears the voice of a man he doesn`t know. Hasegawa asks Gintoki to see whether Hatsu has been cheating on him. To add to his misfortunes, on his way home, he is arrested when he is mistaken for a molester. Gintoki visits Hasegawa in the jail and tells him his findings… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 男達よマダオであれ
Men Are Madao
Otoko-tachi yo Madao de Are
episode.summary: Hasegawa was arrested when he is mistaken for a molester. Haga, the man who appears before him is claims to be Hatsu`s lover. Furthermore, he is a skilled prosecutor and is defending the victim in the molestation trial. Haga uses the situation to his advantage and tells Hasegawa that he`ll let him be found innocent if he divorces Hatsu, but that he`ll make sure he`s guilty if he doesn`t. Hasegawa loses all hope in life and is completely crushed. But Gintoki cheers him up, and Hasegawa becomes determined to fight Haga until the end. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 男なら諦めるな
If You Are a Man, Do Not Give Up
Otoko Nara Akirameruna
episode.summary: In the far reaches of space, there is a planet that is being invaded by an outside force and is on the brink of destruction. Most of the people on the planet have given up fighting, but there are two people who are still trying to save the planet. The two of them seek help from Umibozu, who is called “Space`s Savior,” “The Sweeper,” and “The Strongest Alien Buster.” The man is the strongest is space, but he wears a toupee. He is also incredibly sensitive about toupee-related words. People are hopeful and distrustful of Umibozu. As that goes on, the truth behind the history of the planet comes to light… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 昔の武勇伝は三割増で話せ 盛り上がればいいんだよ盛り上がれば / 花屋とかケーキ屋の娘に男は弱い
Heroic Stories of the Past Are Exaggerated by Three Folds / Boys Are Weak Towards Girls from a Flower Shop or a Cake Shop
Hanaya Toka Cake ya no Musume ni Otoko wa Yowai / Mukashi no Buyuuden wa Sanwarimashi de Hanase
episode.summary: "Catherine, who works at the Snack House Otose used to be called Keys Catherine. She used to loot treasures form across the galaxy and easily opened any safe, no matter how secure. But now, she is deeply grateful to Otose for rehiring her, despite the fact that she stole money from her shop, and is living an honest life. Kurikan, one of Catherine`s old thief buddies, suddenly appears before her. He tells her that he wants her help… Odd jobs have a request to investigate an affair. According to Michiko, the client, her husband has lately been coming home late at night every day and his clothes have smelled of perfume. But her husband has an unexpected secret… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゲームは一日一時間
Game Is an Hour Per Day
Game wa Ichinichi Ichi Jikan
episode.summary: Many passionate otaku have gathered in Akihabara, the otaku holy land. That`s because the new Bentendo OWee game console is going on sale that day. The OWee will only be given to the first hundred people and a long line has formed. Odd jobs Gin has been hired to buy one. They cleverly make plans to get ahead in line. Katsura and Elizabeth are also in line. Even the Shinsengumi, who were asked by Otae to get an OWee, are also standing in line. A fierce battle to get the game console begins… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人生もゲームもバグだらけ
Life as Well as Games Are Only Bugs
Jinsei mo Game mo Bug Darake
episode.summary: The manager of Yodobatsu Camera proposes for two teams to compete in a video game battle to win the OwEe. One team includes the Odd Jobs Trio and Katsura. The other is the Shinsengumi team. The first battle is a dating game battle. The players play the main character of Bakiboki Memorial and the first one to bonk the main heroine is the winner. But Maguko, the main heroine, is the type of girl who goes to school with not bread for breakfast in her mouth, but a swordfish. She`ll be a tough girl to bonk. The second battle is a puzzle game. And after many intense battles, both teams prepare for the final battle… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 好かれないものほど愛おしい
Those Who Are Disliked Are Always Adorable
Akogarenai Mono Hodo Itooshii
episode.summary: Gintoki is reading a manga magazine on the train and harshly criticizes the Gintaman manga. The editor in charge of Gintaman happens to be sitting next to him… Furious at Gintoki`s insults, he explodes challenging Gintoki to try being an editor and lamenting about his terrible workplace. Gintoki accepts and becomes the editor in charge of Gintaman. They visit the manga author’s home and Gintoki sets out to mentor them on how to make Gintaman into a better manga… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 掟は破るためにこそある
Law Exists to Be Violated
Okite wa Yaburu Tame ni Soko Aru
episode.summary: Hijikata visits a swordsmith to fix his favorite sword. He ignores the owner’s advice and leaves with a cursed demon sword. On his way back to the Shinsengumi headquarters, a group of ronin pick a fight with him. Hijikata decides to test out his new sword, but once he takes hold of it the demon sword`s curse turns him into a weakling! Hijikata is stuck in a dangerous situation but someone saves him. Kamotaro Ito, the Shinsengumi`s advisor who has returned to Edo after a year-long absence. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 何事もノリとタイミング
Anything Depends on the Beat and the Timing
Nanigoto mo Nori to Timing
episode.summary: The Shinsengumi was shaken to the core by Ito’s takeover plan. And the person who was really behind the whole plot is revealed! Ito discovers he was just being manipulated and what Hijikata and Kondo`s true feelings about him are. And as he lies dying of his wounds, Ito is finally able to reexamine his life and come to terms with himself. As the Shinsengumi fiercely clash against attacking ronin, Gintoki and Bansai Kawakami`s battle-to-the-death nears its conclusion! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大切なものは見えにくい
Important Things Are Hard to See
Taisetsu na Mono wa Mienikui
episode.summary: With the help of Gintoki and the others, Hijikata finally breaks his curse. But when he tries to interfere with Kondo`s assassination, Ito lashes out at him. As their final battle is about to begin, Gintoki fights against the fierce Bansai Kawakami of the Kiheitai. As they cross swords, Bansai informs Gintoki that the whole fight was a set up to destroy the Shinsengumi. Could the person really pulling the strings be… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 長所と短所は紙一重
The Difference Between Strengths and Weaknesses Is Only a Thin Line
Chousho to Tansho wa Kamihitoe
episode.summary: Ito`s plan to take over the Shinsengumi has left its members completely divided. Kondo is forced into a difficult position with Okita as his only ally. In the final act of his take over plan, Ito begins devising plots to assassinate Kondo. Okita decides to defend Kondo who is trapped in a train full of enemies. Gintoki and the others arrive in time to help, but Hijikata is still cursed! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オタクは話し好き
Otakus Are Talkative
Otaku wa Hanashizuki
episode.summary: A debate show that has gathered 100 otaku is on the air. Shinpachi, the captain of the Tsu Terakado Fan Club, is amongst the participants. As everyone gets into a heated argument over their beliefs, one man has a fierce dispute with Shinpachi. That man is Hijikata who was driven out of the Shinsengumi after being turned into an otaku by the demon sword`s curse. Confronted by a completely different Hijikata, Gintoki and the others learn the demon sword`s terrifying past. Meanwhile, Ito has quickly gained power within the Shinsengumi and the squad members are starting to give off threatening vibes. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恋愛ってたいていサドンデス方式
Most People I Love Sudden Death
Ren`aitte Taitei Sudden Death Houshiki
episode.summary: Amarao is the ace striker for the soccer team, FC Oedo. His retirement match is about to begin and he enthusiastically heads to the waiting room where his teammates await. But when he opens the doors, he sees his teammates have collapsed. The Odd Jobs has been working part-time as venders at the stadium. They accidentally gave the team a toxic drink after mistaking it for a sports drink. Taking responsibility, Gintoki quickly gathers up team members for the match. He rounds up the usual bunch, including Katsura and Hasegawa! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 親の心子知らず
Parents, Not Knowing the Child
Oya no Kokoroshi Shirazu
episode.summary: Odd Jobs accepts a job from Kaguzo, the boss of the Mashiroi Gang. Their task is to use any means possible to drag out Kaguzo`s son, Utsuzo, who has been holed up inside a storehouse for five years. The Odd Jobs Trio tries various tricks to persuade him to come out, but they have no effect on a staunch recluse like Utsuzo. The Trio runs out of ideas and are under pressure from their gang member client. Kyojiro Nakamura, the gang`s lieutenant whom Utsuzo had adored ever since he was a child tells them about Utsuzo`s past. Upon hearing this, Gintoki… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 言わぬが花
Better Leave It Unsaid
Iwanuga Hana
episode.summary: The recluse son of the Mashiroi Gang boss, Kaguzo, is hiding a shocking secret! Upon hearing the details, Gintoki points his sword at Nakamura. Attacked by retaliating gang members, Gintoki escapes and hides. Kaguzo collapses due to illness and the Mashiroi gang’s successor will soon be announced. Just as Nakamura is about to be crowned as Kaguzo’s successor, Gintoki suddenly barges onto the scene… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人生は試験だ
Life Is a Test
Jinsei wa Shiken da
episode.summary: Yamazaki gets orders to go undercover, and attempts to sneak into the Anti-Foreigner Faction hideout. His job is to find out what missions faction members are being given and to apprehend Kotaro Katsura “The Unstoppable” along with all his officials. Yamazaki uses his overwhelming blandness to sneak in without drawing any suspicion. But in order to become an Anti-Foreigner Faction member, he needs to pass an interview with Katsura and a written employment exam. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人は皆自分という檻を破る脱獄囚
Everyone Is an Escapee of a Prison Called "Myself"
Hito wa Mina Jibun to Iu Ori o Yaburu Datsugoku Shuu
episode.summary: Katsura is finally caught thanks to Yamazaki`s actions. The boat he`s placed on is headed to Prison Island, an impregnable prison that is the last place thugs want to go. In one of the cells on the island, Suekichi has been attempting to escape by spending the last 15 year digging a hole through his wall. He has just completed his escape route. All he has to do is decide on which day to escape. Suekichi has watched the patrol patterns of the guards for many years. He carefully waits for an opportunity. But when Katsura is placed in the cell across from him, Suekichi`s plans begin to unravel… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: NH物は彼女に見つかるな / ほぼ100%の確率でビニール傘を置き忘れてくる自分が嫌い
Definitely Do Not Let Your Girlfriend See the Things You Use for Crossdressing / There`s Almost a 100% Chance of Forgetting One`s Vinyl Umbrella and Then Hating Oneself
NH Butsu wa Kanojo ni Mitsukaru na / Hobo 100% no Kakuritsu de Vinyl Kasa o Okiwasurete Kuru Jibun ga Kirai
episode.summary: Perhaps it`s because of the rain, but the Odd Jobs haven’t been receiving jobs for several days. And they grow more and more irritated by the humid climate. Shinpachi tries to liven things up by inviting Gintoki and Kagura to stroll around Edo in the rain. But when they pass by three girls with flower-print umbrellas, Kagura’s mood worsens. She closes her plastic umbrella and walks off getting soaked by the rain… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 二十代の誕生日に深い意味はない / 起きて働く果報者
A Birthday in Your Twenties Has No Deep Meaning / You`re Lucky If You Can Stay Up Late to Work
Nijuudai no Tanjoubi ni Fukai Imi wa Nai / Okite Hataraku Kahou Mono
episode.summary: Tama, the robot maid, has started to work at the Otose Snack House. She helps by collecting rent from Gintoki and the others. Otose appreciates the fact that she works hard without any rest and decides to give her three days off. But as a maid, Tama only knows how to work for other people. She doesn`t know how she should spend her break. Gintoki decides to take Tama out for some fun, but… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 便器を磨く事これ心を磨く事なり / サブタイトル未定
The Act of Polishing a Urinal Is Like the Act of Polishing One`s Heart / Subtitle Undecided
Benki o Migaku Koto Kore Kokoro o Migaku Koto Nari / Subtitle Mitei
episode.summary: Okita and the First Squad are in charge of cleaning the Shinsengumi headquarters’ bathroom for the week. Everyone mutters complaints as they polish toilets. But one man happily works without complaint. It is Seizo Kumanaku, who is well known within the Shinsengumi as a neat freak. He lectures his squad mates about the importance of a clean bathroom, but it fails to raise their spirits. Seizo is irritated by how dirty the toilets are and he suggests to Hijikata that they have a Bathroom Revolution. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: プリンに醤油かけたらウニの味がするって言うけどプリンに醤油かけてもプリンと醤油の味しかしない
They Say Soy Sauce on Pudding Tastes Like Sea Urchin, but Soy Sauce on Pudding Only Tastes Like Pudding and Soy Sauce
Pudding ni Shouyu Kaketara Uni no Aji ga Surutte Iu Kedo Pudding ni Shouyu Kakete mo Pudding to Shouyu no Aji Shika Shinai
episode.summary: Matsudaira is furious when he learns that his daughter Kuriko`s coworkers are making advances on her. He carries out an extreme plan to tear them away from her. Kondo and Okita agree with his plan and help out. But it just spins everything even more extreme and out of control. Upon seeing this, Hijikata offers to get Kuriko`s coworkers to give up on her, but… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 夏休みは始まる前が一番楽しい
The Time Just Before the Summer Holidays Start Is the Most Fun
Natsuyasumi wa Hajimaru Mae ga Ichiban Tanoshii
episode.summary: The Odd Jobs takes a gig working as lifeguards on the beach. Gintoki and Shinpachi ignore their work and focus on staring at the girls. Kagura immediately finds a suspicious person named Kamenashi, who is dressed like a turtle, and beats him up. Gintoki and the group find out that Kamenashi has been secretly filming girls in swimsuits. Kamenashi desperately makes excuses, but Gintoki and the others aren’t fooled. Kamenashi then says he`ll invite them to Ryugu Palace if they let him go. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 亀の甲より年の功
The Older, the Wiser
Kamenokou Yori Toshinokou
episode.summary: Gintoki and the others were tossed into the ocean on their way to Ryugu Palace and are now stranded on an unknown deserted island. They search the island for any resources to help survive and are reunited with Kamenashi. Amazingly, the island was Ryugu Palace. Meanwhile, giant turtle robots have appeared in Edo and Gintoki and the others hear about it on the news on TV. According to Kamenashi, Otohime, the owner of Ryugu Palace is carrying out a devious plan. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 美は夏の果実の如き物
Beauty Is Like a Summer Fruit
Bi wa Natsu no Kajitsu no Gotoki Mono
episode.summary: The group learns about Ryugu Palace`s hidden past and Otohime`s terrifying plan. And they are the only ones who can stop her. Kamenashi suggests they split up into teams and head to Otohime. While breaking up into teams, they are spotted by lookouts and they are thrust in a desperate situation. Meanwhile, Otae, who has been captured by Otohime, is in danger! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 腰は曲がってもまっすぐに
Be as Straightforward as Your Back Is Bent
Koshi wa Magatte mo Massugu ni
episode.summary: Otohime`s terrifying plot that involves all of Edo finally enters its final stage. Gintoki, Katsura, Shinpachi, Kagura and the others make every effort to stop her plans… How will this battle end? And what will be the fate of Earth?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: タバコは一箱に一, 二本馬糞みたいな匂いのする奴が入っている
Those Who Smoke One or Two Cigarettes Are Putting the Smell of Horse Dung in Them
Tabako wa Ichihako ni Ichi, Nippon Bafun Mitai na Nioi no Suru Yatsu ga Haitte Iru
episode.summary: Smoking has been completely banned in the Shinsengumi headquarters due to Okita`s suggestion. Hijikata, a heavy smoker, desperately resists but is pressured by his peer squad members and reluctantly gives in. He goes outside to smoke but lately most places have also banned smoking…The times have changed and smoking has been banned all throughout Edo by Matsudaira`s suggestion. What will the desperate Hijikata do?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 海外の日本料理店の味はだいたい学食レベル / 一度取った皿は戻さない
The Taste of Overseas Japanese Restaurants Is Generally at the Same Level as a School Cafeteria / Once You`ve Chosen a Dish, You Can`t Give It Back
Kaigai no Nippon Ryouriten no Aji wa Daitai Gakushoku Level / Ichido Totta Sara wa Modosanai
episode.summary: Hasegawa is finally left in charge of a sushi restaurant after some very harsh training. He invites Gintoki and the others to the restaurant. The group is excited to hear that they can eat all they want, but Hasegawa skills are seriously lacking! Upon seeing Hasegawa troubled, the group decides to help him out. But Gintoki and the others are complete amateurs. They make use of their skills and struggle to make sushi, but… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 素人はプラスとマイナスだけで十分だ
Only a Slotted and a Crosshead Screwdriver Is Needed for an Amateur
Shirouto wa Plus to Minus Dake de Juubun da
episode.summary: One day, Gintoki and the others are lazing about like always when they realize Shinpachi`s finger has been turned into a Phillips screwdriver. It seems to be the work of an Amanto, but Shinpachi is too busy freaking out. Soon they discover that Kagura and Gintoki have also been modified. The group try to catch the Amanto responsible, but their only clue is that he`s hooked on a popular online game. The three immediately begin playing the game to track down the Amanto and demand he revert their bodies back to normal, but… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 想像力は中2で培われ
Imagination Should Be Developed in Grade 2
Souzou Tyoku wa Chuu 2 de Tsuchikawareru
episode.summary: In order to turn their bodies back to normal after being turned into screwdrivers, Gintoki and the others play an online game to track down the Amanto supposedly responsible for their transformation. As soon as they begin, they disrupt the order in the game and are attacked by a powerful enemy. A certain hunter saves them from their desperate situation. This player appears to be a veteran hero, but in reality he’s been turned into a screwdriver just like Gintoki and the others. Soon the group encounters even more people who have be transformed screwdrivers. They all try to track down information about the Amanto culprit within the game, but… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: いつも心に一本のドライバー
There Is a Screwdriver in Everyone`s Hearts
Itsumo Kokoro ni Ippon no Driver
episode.summary: Gintoki and the others have lost their clue about the gamer in the Monkey Hunter game. They gather for an offline meeting at a barbeque restaurant and try to devise a plan but are short on good ideas. And Katsura merely says “What we need right now is the determination to live as screwdrivers.” Will Gintoki and the others ever return to their original forms?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: おねだりも度がすぎれば脅迫
Too Much Badgering Can Become a Threatening One
Onedari mo Tabi ga Sugireba Kyohaku
episode.summary: Otsu has overcome her past scandals and become Edo`s top idol. And the release date of her new single has finally been announced! Shinpachi and her other fans are overjoyed at the news. But there trouble arises right before the release. Otsu`s music producer, Tsunpo, is late with the creation of her song and says the release will be postponed. Otsu is determined to not betray her fans and takes her own actions, but… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最終章突入!
Into the Final Chapter!
Saishuu Shou Totsunyuu!
episode.summary: The Gintama anime has finally reached the middle of its third year on the air. Shinpachi explains the purpose of this episode and aims to look back on all their past adventures and build up new enthusiasm and nostalgia. Upon hearing that the final chapter is not the final episode and that the series will continue for another six months, Gintoki and Kagura lose all enthusiasm. Then the ending credits and preview plays. Is this episode really over after only six minutes? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 文字でしか伝わらないものがある
There Are Things That Cannot Be Expressed in Words
Monji de Shika Tsutawaranai Mono ga Aru
episode.summary: The fan club members for Edo`s top idol, Tsu Terakado, are at the beach practicing their choreography for an upcoming concert. But Takachin notices his fellow members’ enthusiasm getting sloppy. One of the fan club officers has started exchanging e-mails with a girl he met through a blog. Shinpachi is furious the officer has broken their club rule of “Secret communication with women is forbidden.” As their captain, he puts some spirit into them, but… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 会わないとわからないこともある
There Are Things You Can`t Understand Unless You Meet Them
Awanai to Wakaranai Koto mo Aru
episode.summary: Even though it’s believed the letters are coming from Okita, Shinpachi`s response letter turn out to be a big hit. Urara is happy her older sister has received a response to her letters. But her older sister confesses that she sent Urara`s picture with the letter. And it looks like both Shinpachi and Urara sent someone else`s pictures with their letters! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 拾い食いに気をつけろ
Watch Out for Your Pet Eating Off the Floor
Hiroikuini Ki o Tsukero
episode.summary: Worried about her pet’s sudden drop in appetite, Kagura takes Sadaharu to the veterinary hospital. Katsura happens to be there as well, explaining how Elizabeth is in bad health and has been hospitalized to undergo surgery. Fortunately Sadaharu’s condition is nothing serious, but he’s kept overnight just to be safe. Around the same time, an old dog that has also been hospitalized is about to take its last breath. It seems the owner is in critical condition as well, and with only death awaiting them both, Kagura decides to take the old dog to its owner. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 猫好きと犬好きは相容れない
Cat-Lovers and Dog-Lovers Never Keep Peace
Nekozuki to Inuzuki wa Aiirenai
episode.summary: To let the dying dog Kintaro see its owner for one last time, Kagura and Katsura sneak it out of the hospital…only to find themselves caught in the war between the “Planet Eaters” (dogs) and “Planet Pukers” (cats), while Earth’s fate hangs in the balance. Escaping from the Planet Pukers, who are after Kintaro, the two head to the hospital where the old man is hospitalized. Meanwhile, the old man, who is supposedly in critical condition, goes missing. The old man’s children request Gintoki’s services, but when he arrives at the hospital… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 会ってもわからないこともある
There Are Things You Can`t Understand Even When You Meet Them
Atte mo Wakaranai Koto mo Aru
episode.summary: Urara`s older sister learns that Shinpachi sent Okita`s picture with his letters. Shinpachi desperately tries to apologize, but Urara`s older sister tells him that she wants to help him get Urara to like him. Afterwards, Gintoki and the others meet up with Urara and Okita. They try to get Urara`s attention, but she is only interested in Okita. Urara`s older sister can’t do anything about it and runs away in regret. Shinpachi is worried and goes after her, but… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 旅行先ではだいたいケンカする
Quarrels Usually Happen at the Trip Destination
Ryokousaki dewa daitai KENKA suru
episode.summary: Otose arranges for Gintoki and the gang to spend their winter break at a hot spring inn located deep in the mountains. Anticipating a secluded hot spring bath, the group hikes their way up the mountain trail, only to arrive at a completely deserted and run-down inn. With no available bus to return to Edo, the gang has no choice but to stay at the inn. The inn’s Okami Oiwa welcomes the group, but Gintoki and Shinpachi notice a transparent being standing behind her back! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ブリーフの××筋は絶対不可避
Tight Underpants Will Unavoidably Get Soiled
Brief no XX [Chome Chome] Suji wa Zettai Fukahi
episode.summary: The inn Gintoki and the gang are staying at turns out to be a ghost inn where all the stands (ghosts) gather, unable to enter heaven due to their attachment to the living world! Gintoki finds himself left all alone after Shinpachi, Kagura, and Otae are all possessed by stands. The Okami Oiwa explains she was looking for someone tough enough to help run the inn. Forced into working as an employee trainee, Gintoki must now join his co-worker Rei to greet the visiting stand customers… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 銀と閣下の穀潰し
Gin and His Excellency`s Good for Nothing
Gin to Kakka no Gokutsubushi
episode.summary: Sick and tired of Oiwa’s tyranny, Gintoki decides to shut down the inn by teaming up with Rei. He plans to use Nobunaga, Hideyoshi, and Mitsuhide (their stands, that is) to bring down the inn’s reputation but is stopped by Okami Otose. Though overwhelmed at first by Okami’s most powerful stand Tagosaku, Gintoki nonetheless manages to exorcize the inn’s customers with the help of Shinpachi and the gang, who are now themselves living stands. With the fate of the inn and himself at stake, Gintoki finally enters a one-on-one battle with Oiwa. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 幽霊ネタやる時は慎重に
Be Very Careful When Using Ghost Stories
Yuurei Neta Yaru Toki wa Shinchou ni
episode.summary: Oiwa lets Tagosaku possess her own body to become “His Excellency.” Fueled by anger and sadness, her surge of attacks gradually corner Gintoki. But just in the nick of time, Gintoki also lets himself be possessed by Stands to become “His Excellency.” To bring down the wasted ghost inn, Gintoki risks everything he has to go up against Oiwa! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 地球の前に, もっと危ない「キンタマン」の未来を考えろ
Before Thinking About the Earth, Think About the More Endangered Gintaman`s Future!
Chikyuu no Mae ni, Motto Abunai "kintaman" no Mirai o Kangaero
episode.summary: Once, the manga Gintaman gained immense popularity in Jump magazine, and was even made into an animated series thanks to Gintoki’s random advice. Ofuji has since taken over from Konishi as editor of Gintaman… But now the manga’s popularity is on a steady decline! Under these desperate circumstances, Gintoki is once again called forth to help fix the problem! Strong criticism and heated debate ensue between Ofuji, Konishi, and Amachi Sensei, along with their special guest. In the end, what sort of breakthrough solution have they come up with?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 己の居場所は己で作るものなり
It`s Your House, You Build It
Ore no Ibasho wa Ore de Tsukuru Mono Nari
episode.summary: As always, Hasegawa, aka DORK (Dumb Old Retarded Kook) idles away his life. While talking on the phone with his estranged wife Hatsu, Hasegawa ends up inviting her over to his house. But thanks to a string of misfortunes, his home is now a cardboard box in the park! Having told Hatsu that he lives in a pretty nice place, Hasegawa asks Gintoki to help him look for a descent housing… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 告白に自信のある男なんて99%いない / サンタはいないって奴こそ本当は信じたいのねこの天邪鬼さん
99% of Men Are Not Confident in Confessing Their Love
Kokuhaku ni Jishin no Aru Otoko Nante 99% Inai / Santa wa Inaitte Yatsu Koso Hontou wa Shinjitai no Neko no Amanojaku-san
episode.summary: Having been neglected for so long despite her strong love for Gintoki, Sachan finally goes on the offensive. She tries to win the heart of the sugar-loving Gintoki with a cake. Naturally, her plan fails. That’s when Kondo happens to pass by. Like Sachan, Kondo’s feelings for Otae have continued unrequited and are casually brushed aside (or rather, exploited for running her errands). They argue over who is loved more than the other. After their heated debate, they somehow end up playing cupid for each other… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 時には昔の話をしようか
Why Not Talk About the Old Days for a Change?
Toki ni wa Mukashi no Hanashi o Shiyou ka
episode.summary: It’s the usual scene at Odd Jobs Gin. Shinpachi and Kagura are cleaning up the place when they see a picture fall out of the back of a wall frame. To their surprise, the picture is a shot of Gintoki and a mystery beauty! Could she be a woman from his past? While the two argue over the woman’s identity, Gintoki returns with the groceries and reveals a surprising truth. The woman in the picture was the semi-regular character in the “previous” Odd Jobs Gin. For the first time ever, before even Shinpachi or Kagura joined, the story of when Gintoki just started running the Odd Jobs business is revealed… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 財布は尻ポケットに入れるな
Don`t Put Your Wallet in Your Back Pocket
Saifu wa Shiri Pocket ni Ireruna
episode.summary: Seita is a kid who makes his living through pickpocketing. One day Seita picks Gintoki’s wallet only to find it pretty much empty, and discovers that his own wallet was picked back in return. In the end Seita treats Gintoki to some parfait after getting caught red-handed. Brought into Snack Otose for questioning, Seita shocks everyone by revealing he needed the money to see a certain “遊女/Yujo (courtesans/ prostitute).” Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 晴れの日に雨傘さす奴には御用心
Beware of Those Who Use an Umbrella on a Sunny Day
Hare no Hi ni Amagasa Sasu Yatsu ni wa Goyoujin
episode.summary: Seita was picking pockets to see Hinowa, the highest-ranked 遊女/Yujo (courtesans/ prostitute) in the underground 遊郭/Yukaku (Licensed Quarters) Yoshiwara Tougenkyo, where law has no meaning. But his picking act was all for the sake of seeing the mother he was separated from at a young age. To let Seita see Hinowa, Gintoki and the gang march into Yoshiwara Tougenkyo, where they receive a rough welcome by Tsukuyo – the head of Yoshiwara’s paramilitary force, “Hyakka.” Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ケンカの横槍は危険
Butting into a Fight Is Dangerous
Kenka no Yokoyari wa Kiken
episode.summary: Kagura’s older brother Kamui arrives in Yoshiwara. As the Seventh Division Captain of the Space Pirate Harusame, Kamui is here to talk with the division’s former captain, The Night King, Hosen. At first everything seems to go well, but tensions gradually start to build up… Meanwhile, escaping from Kamui and his men’s attack, Gintoki and the gang take refuge at Tsukuyo’s hideout. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絆の色は十人十色
The Color for Each Person`s Bond Comes in Various Colors
Kizuna no Iru wa Juunintoiro
episode.summary: The only way to defeat Hosen is to bring back the Sun to the Yoshiwara Shangri-La, the city trapped within eternal night. Seita runs for the control room to break open the iron-plated seal covering the city. Meanwhile, Gintoki and the Hyakka led by Tsukuyo are desperately holding off Hosen’s attack. But despite their best efforts, they cannot stop the King of The Night’s onslaught… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 寝物語は信用するな
Don`t Trust Bedtime Stories
Nemonogatari wa Shinyou Suruna
episode.summary: Gintoki arrives before Hosen, just in the nick of time. To restore the bond between mother and son that has been torn by the city of eternal light, Gintoki engages Hosen with fierce determination. But against the King of the Night’s awesome powers, Gintoki is beaten helplessly to the ground. “Go home to the world above with your mom…” Taking to heart the words left by Gintoki, Seita tries to escape from Yoshiwara with Hinowa, but… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 四本足で立つのが獣 二本足と意地と見栄で立つのが男
Those Who Stand on Four Legs Are Beasts. Those Who Stand on Two Legs, Guts, and Glory, Are Men
Yonhon Ashi de Tatsu no ga Kedamono, Nihon Ashi to Iji to Mie de Tatsu no ga Otoko
episode.summary: Amidst the fierce battle, Kagura awakens to her Yato instincts and defeats Abuto. Thanks to Shinpachi’s desperate plea, Kagura is able to return to her senses and together they head after Hosen. Meanwhile Kamui has brought Seita before Hinowa, who is confined to her quarters. “Mom, let’s go home together!” Seita shouts out to his beloved mother. However, unexpected words leave Hinowa’s mouth… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人生は選択肢の連続
Life Is a Series of Choices
Jinsei wa Sentakushi no Renzoku
episode.summary: As Gintoki and the gang head toward Hosen’s lair, they encounter Abuki, one of Kamui’s subordinates, and are overwhelmed by the incredible fighting power of the Yato Clan. On Shinpachi and Kagura’s urging, Gintoki heads out to face Hosen alone. The remaining two fight desperately against Abuki, only to be cornered by the overwhelming difference in power. In the midst of the fierce battle Kagura renews her feelings toward her older brother Kamui and her reason for fighting. But with Shinpachi’s life in danger, Kagura goes through a dramatic transformation… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 昼間に飲む酒は一味違う
The Taste of Drinking Under Broad Daylight Is Something Special
Hiruma ni Nomu Sake wa Hitoaji Chigau
episode.summary: At last the sun rises above Yoshiwara Shangri-La, the city of eternal light. At the end of a fierce battle, Hosen finally reveals his true feelings for Hinowa and passes away. Observing the entire battle from afar, Kamui is greeted by Kagura and Shinpachi. Kagura is enraged with her reunited brother, but Kamui leaves after “declaring war” with Gintoki. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 全ての大人達は全ての子供達のインストラクター
Every Adult Is Every Children`s Instructor
Subete no Otona-tachi wa Subete no Kodomo-tachi no Instructor
episode.summary: It is shortly after the fierce battle at Yoshiwara Shngri-la. Shinpachi and Kagura, having faced powerful foes in Hosen and Kamui unlike any they have encountered, are training hard after realizing their lack of strength. Both announce to Gintoki their determination to become stronger. But Gintoki declines to become involved, saying it’s a pain. Learning of the situation, Otae and Hasegawa share their training secrets, but…? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チャックはゆっくり引きあげろ
Zippers Should Be Undone Slowly
Chack wa Yukkuri Hikiagero
episode.summary: During their routine night patrol Hijikata and Okita are attacked and kidnapped by an unknown assailant. When they wake up, the two find themselves chained together and imprisoned inside an abandoned room. As the two come to realize how bad the situation is, a creepy man speaks to them over the monitor. The man, who calls himself Jigzaw, reveals that he has placed a bomb at the Shinsengumi headquarters, and that the only way Hijikata and Okita can escape is for one to kill the other! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チューパットを二つに分ける時はあの持つトコある奴の方がなんかイイ あそこから飲むのもオツ
When Your Half Eaten Popsicle Starts Sliding Down the Stick, That`s When Jerks Come Around Hoping for a Share
Chuupatto o Futatsu ni Wakeru Toki wa Ano Motsu Toko Aru Yatsu no Kata ga Nanka Ii Asoko kara Nomu no Mootsu
episode.summary: As the bombing of the Shinsengumi headquarters nears, Hijikata and Okita are still unable to find any means for escape. Only one key exists to unlock the shackles chaining each other. But if the key is used, it will set off a bomb to kill the other. The rule of the devil begins to stir distrust between the two. Though he commends them for not betraying one another, Jigzaw pressures them to make the final decision by displaying a certain item. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 長いものには巻かれろ!!
Become Bound by Long Things
Nagai Mono ni wa Makareru
episode.summary: The Odd Jobs trio is going about their usual meaningless chatter when a man with an eye-patch suddenly shows up and begins “ordering” them around. The man’s “power” is so strong, the Odd Jobs find themselves unable to defy his orders… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 髪切りながら交わされる美容師との会話は世界で一番どうでもいい
A Conversation with a Barber During a Haircut Is the Most Pointless Thing in The World
Kamigiri Nagara Kawasareru Biyoushi to no Kaiwa wa Sekai de Ichiban Dou de mo Ii
episode.summary: The Odd Jobs trio finds themselves watching after an old-fashioned and empty barber store called Kamiyuidoko. As they look over at the newly opened beauty parlor across the street, they see Kondo, who has been denied service! When the depressed Kondo enters Kamiyuidoko, the Odd Jobs trio find themselves in an awkward position, particularly since they don’t know how to cut hair. Disguising themselves, the gang tries to make Kondo leave, but after seeing his haggard face Shinpachi and Kagura take pity and invite him in. It’s time for an insecure man whose popularity is overshadowed among good-looking men to get a makeover! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天は人の上に人をつくらず髷をつくりました
The Heavens Created Chomage Above Man Instead of Another Man.
Ten wa Hito no Ue ni Hito o Tsukurazu Mage o Tsukurimashita
episode.summary: Matsudaira is being accompanied by a young samurai who turns out to be the Shogun! Wishing to learn more about civilian life, the Shogun asks for a haircut at the Kamiyuidoko. Under such pressure, Shinpachi and Kagura can’t help but vomit, but then a piece of Kagura’s undigested naruto lands on the Shogun’s forehead and won’t come off. Gintoki attempts to take off the naruto with a razor, only to screw up and slice off the Shogun’s mage instead! Convinced that their actions will get them killed for sure, the Odd Jobs trio attempts to cover their act by throwing away the mage outside. But... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 寝る子は育つ
Sleep Helps a Child Grow
Neru Ko wa Sodatsu
episode.summary: Kagura can’t sleep after wasting an entire day doing nothing. She tries to sleep by switching mattresses with Gintoki and changing where her eyeballs are focused and the way she breathes. But it all only helps in keeping her and Gintoki wide-awake. Taking Gintoki’s advice that exercise and a full stomach will lead to sleep, Kagura goes on a 50-lap midnight jog around the neighborhood and finishes an entire cooker of rice. But neither helps in making her sleepy. Will Kagura ever get a good night’s sleep?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 誕生日会はいつものアイツが違う奴に見える
That Person Looks Different from Usual During a Birthday Party
Tanjoubikai wa Itsumo no Aitsu ga Chigau Yatsu ni Mieru
episode.summary: Otae and Shinpachi are invited to Kyubei’s birthday party. The two arrive at the Yagyu mansion with a birthday cake in hand, only to find the place filled with celebrities from the entertainment and political worlds and other various industries! When the two begin to feel out of place, they spot Gintoki, Katsura, Hasegawa, and Kamenashi (without his shell) causing a huge commotion. Naturally, with these members together in one place trouble is bound to happen… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 裏の裏の裏は裏
The Other Side of the Other Side of the Other Side Would Be the Other Side
Ura no Ura no Ura wa Ura
episode.summary: Hasewage is tired of always losing and being called a Madao, so it`s off to the races. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 屋台に入るには微妙に勇気がいる
It Takes a Bit of Courage to Enter a Street Vendor`s Stand
Yatai ni Hairu ni wa Bimyou ni Yuuki ga Iru
episode.summary: Yatai “Guchiri-Ya” (Whining Store) has three rules: One, a customer can come in alone and whine as much as they want. Two, if there’s a familiar face, pretend like you don’t know them. And three, do not share the stories you hear. Tonight’s customers are a drowsy-looking samurai with a sweet tooth, a Mayo samurai, and finally Mr. Gorilla (pseudonym). Though permitted to whine, the three customers cannot help feeling awkward about it. So the master speaks on their behalf and spills their usual complaints, causing panic amongst the group. Just then, a familiar-looking woman enters the Yatai and begins attacking the other customers with sharp words (and weapons)! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 男が揃えばどんな場所でも戦場になる
Any Place with a Bunch of Men Gathered Around Will Turn Into a Battlefield
Otoko ga Soroeba Donna Bashou Demo Senjou ni Naru
episode.summary: Today’s Tsu Terakado concert is another lively success. But fan club president Shinpachi is angered because only four of the Tsu Terakado fan club members have come to the concert. He is further enraged to learn that many of the club members have left without permission and have joined the new Tsusentai fan club instead. To Shinpachi’s surprise, the Tsusentai leader is Hijikata, who thanks to the demonic sword’s curse has now become a charismatic otaku! Can Shinpachi protect his only(?) distinctive trait from Tosshi’s onslaught?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 友達がケガしたらすぐに病院へ
If a Friend Gets Injured, Take Him to the Hospital
Tomodachi ga Kega Shitara Sugu ni Byouin e
episode.summary: The fierce battle begins over the title of the Official Tsu Terakado fan club. Tosshi, Hijikata’s loser otaku personality created from a demonic sword, was once thought to have been defeated by Hijikata’s strong will, but in reality the personality still survives within him. By reigning as the king of otaku, Hijikata plans to put Tosshi’s soul to rest. Tosshi’s road to the king of otaku versus Shinpachi’s love for Otsu-chan. Who shall be victorious?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: みかんは一個腐るといつの間にかダンボール中のみかんを腐らせる
If One Orange in the Box Is Rotten, the Rest of Them Will Become Rotten Before You Know It!
Mikan wa Ikko Kusaru to Itsu no Ma ni ka Danbooru Chuu no Mikan o Kusaraseru
episode.summary: The preliminary round for the Official Tsu Terakado fan club title is a marathon race.
