With Takachin in critical condition and Kagura taking the wrong route, team Shinpachi’s chances of winning look slim. But thanks to Gintoki’s quick thinking, Takachin makes an instant (and improved?) recovery and emerges from the hospital to rejoin the race! As the race gradually turns into a battle of deception, Shinpachi runs furiously for the goal. Will he be able to beat the tactical general Tosshi?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 外国人から見たらこっちも外国人 宇宙人から見たらこっちも宇宙人
From a Foreigner`s Perspective, You`re the Foreigner
Gaikokujin Kara Mitara Kocchi mo Gaikokujin Uchuujin Kara Mitara Kocchi mo Uchuujin
episode.summary: Tosshi finishes the preliminary race in first place by rounding up all the contestants to block Shinpachi’s team from making the goal. Despite Toshi’s scheming, team Otsu-chan fan club makes a surprising comeback to finish in second place! Hijikata points out that the team cheated by changing their member lineup, but with his own member suspected of using a taxi, the objection is dropped. Kondo and Kagura also finish the race after taking the wrong route and being dropped off by the police. Meanwhile, what happened to Shinpachi who’s still in the race? That being said and done, the main event finally takes place! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 何回見てもラピュタはいい
Laputa`s Still Good After Seeing It So Many Times
Nanka Mite mo Laputa wa Ii
episode.summary: For the second round in the Official Tsu Terakado fan club championships, it is a battle of charms. Both teams must come up with a virtualized situation where the winner is decided by Otsu-chan saying “yes.” First up is the Tsusengumi’s story, taking place in a bar with a beautiful night view. But the romantic mood is ruined thanks to Okita the narrator and assistants Kondo and “Mohawk” Yamazaki going out of control. Hijikata begins to panic, but with Kondo and the others’ carefully crafted stage direction he succeeds in asking Otsu-chan out. Shinpachi’s team find themselves in a tight situation, but...? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 愛とは無償のものなり
Love Asks for Nothing in Return
Ai to wa Mushou no Mono Nari
episode.summary: The time to settle the battle for the official fan club title is finally here. The match between Shinpachi and Hijikata is a card battle using Otsu chip playing cards. Never knowing such a thing existed, Shinpachi rushes to the vendor for some cards. Hijikata on the other hand is fully prepared and delivers the ultra powerful card “Melancholy 5-minutes before start”! Hijikata’s range of powerful attacks forces Shinpachi to stay on the defensive. Can he possibly find a way to make a counterattack? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黒船は沈む時も派手
The Black Ships Even Make a Scene When They Sink !
Kurofune wa Shizumu Toki mo Hade
episode.summary: After an intense battle, Shinpachi and Hijikata both fall to the ground with zero life points. Despite being exhausted and battered, the two men rise up to resume their battle. They fight as if their lives—no, their very souls—were on the line and Otsu begs them to stop. But nobody can stop them now. For their battle is no longer just for the title of official fan club... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 松茸のお吸い物ってアレ ホンモノよりうまいよね/人は死んだら生き返らない
That Matsutake Soup Stuff Tastes Better Than the Real Deal, Plus One. / Man Cannot Come Back to Life Once Dead.
Matsutake no Osuimonotte Are Honmono Yori Umai yo ne / Hito wa Shindara Ikikaeranai
episode.summary: PART A - Rumors of Odd Jobs imposters gaining popularity within the city reach Gintoki’s ears. Upon investigating, the Odd Jobs Trio discover that someone is using their Odd Jobs name for fishy business and making a fortune out of it. Gintoki and the gang seek out to uncover the imposters’ identities, only to discover...?! PART B - A man dressed in blue full-body spandex appears before Shinpachi. The “Blue Man” begins talking to a dumbfounded Shinpachi. He claims to have come from the future, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 柳の下にどじょうは沢山いる
If It Works Once, It`ll Work over and over Again
Yanagi no Shita ni Dojou wa Takusan Iru
episode.summary: The city is hit by a bad flu one winter day. Even Otae is sick with the flu. Shinpachi gets some long-awaited time alone with his sister and is tending to her when he gets a visit from Gintoki and Kagura. Turns out the two have also caught the flu and want Shinpachi to look after them. Irritated by Gintoki and Kagura’s abrupt visit, not to mention their selfish demands, Shinpachi is surprised when even more sick guests arrive. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一つより二つ 一人より二人
Two Is Better Than One. Two People Are Better Than One.
Hitotsu Yori Futatsu Hitori Yori Futari
episode.summary: Hijikata is on a stakeout near the apartment’s dumpster. There, a sleepy Gintoki comes to throw away his trash. Finding Gintoki’s persistent intrusion a burden, Hijikata arrests Gintoki for insulting and obstructing an officer on duty. But while pushing and shoving each other, Hijikata accidentally handcuffs himself to Gintoki. Hijikata calls Okita who is staking out a different location to come and unlock them and take Gintoki to the Shinsengumi Headquarters. Instead, Okita puts a second pair of handcuffs on Gintoki and Hijikata. In the midst of all this, the Radical Joi Faction makes a move. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: なめらかなポリゴンは人の心もなめらかにする
Smooth Polygons Smooth Men`s Hearts Too
Nameraka na Porigon wa Hito no Kokoro mo Nameraka ni Suru
episode.summary: Tama works hard everyday starting early in the morning. Even when Otose tells her to take a break, Tama won’t and says she is happy just being with everyone. But Otose notices that Tama’s appearance has changed into that of an angular polygon from an old video game! While Otose and Gintoki discuss that it must have been brought on by overwork, Tama returns from shopping and has now regressed from polygons to pixels!! Why is she going through these changes? And will she be able to return to normal?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人の身体は小宇宙
A Human Body Is Like a Little Universe
Hito no Karada wa Shouuchuu
episode.summary: After learning from Gengai that Tama has been infected by a computer virus, the Odd Jobs trio launch “Operation Midget” and enter Tama’s body to eradicate the virus. Inside, they find an injured man dressed in a white body suit who begs them to deliver a message to the king. Arriving at the Leukocyte Kingdom, the gang finds the place filled with RPG-themed shops such as weapon stores, inns, and casinos. The group decides to enjoy this RPG-like world by playing at the casino and visiting the church to save their game. Joined by Tama’s avatar, Gintoki and the gang head out in search of the Leukocyte King. Let the adventure to destroy the computer virus begin! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 導かれしバカたち
The Chosen Idiots
Michibikareshi Baka-tachi
episode.summary: Gintoki and the gang arrive at Tama’s main system. The group tries to devise a battle strategy for fighting the Great Archfiend Tapir’s black body suit minions. But they can’t come to an agreement. Deciding it’s a waste of time, Kagura charges alone into the swarm of black body suits. Using this as a diversion, the group storms the enemy base, only to be surrounded after Gintoki and the Leukocyte King get into an argument. But during their rumble to decide who’s the strongest, the two wind up destroying the black body suit minions. And finally, the Great Archfiend Tapir appears! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: そして伝説へ
And into the Legend...
Soshite Densetsu e
episode.summary: At last, Gintoki and his friends confront the Great Archfiend. While the Leukocyte King can’t lay a finger on the Great Archfiend who has taken Tama’s form, Gintoki attacks without giving a damn. Angered by his reckless impudence, the Leukocyte King turns on Gintoki. The Great Archfiend then takes the form of the Leukocyte King’s father. But this time Shinpachi and Kagura attack him, and they succeed in kicking him off the throne. The Odd Jobs trio takes this chance to finish the Great Archfiend off, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大事なのは見た目でなく中身 / 見た目より中身といっても限度がある
It`s What`s on the Inside That Counts / It`s What`s on the Inside That Counts, but Only to a Certain Extent
Oogoto Nano wa Mita Me Dewa Naku Nakami / Mita Me Dewa Naku Nakami to Ittemo Gendo ka Aru
episode.summary: Part A “It`s What`s On The Inside That Counts" While taking Sadaharu out for a walk, Gintoki runs into Katsura who is with some “thing” that hardly resembles Elizabeth. Shinpachi and Kagura also notice the change in Elizabeth, or more like being totally replaced, and decide to bring Katsura back to his senses. Part B “It`s What`s On The Inside That Counts, But Only To A Certain Extent” It is morning and Gintoki wakes up in his closet for some reason. Dumbfounded, he makes his way to his bedroom after going to the bathroom, only to find himself already sleeping in his bed. Realizing that something funny is happening to him yet again, he tries to resolve it through trial and error. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アメとムチは使いよう
It All Depends on How You Use the "Carrot and Stick" Method
Ame to Muchi ha Tsukaiyo
episode.summary: A man called Executioner Kohei is brought under strict guard to the Shinsengumi. He is the executive officer of the Radical Joi Faction, the Akatsuki Party, and is also a lethal murderer who has killed 35 bakufu officials. According to Kondo, Kohei not only endures torture, but laughs with joy during it. The Shinsengumi’s mission is to get Kohei to tell them details about the large-scale terrorist attack the Akatsuki Party is supposedly planning. First off is Yamazaki, who goes to the investigation room to take a stab at it! Will he be able to get Kohei to talk?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 真似ばかりしていると訴えられる / なくなって始めてわかるいとおしさ
If You Keep Copying, They Will Retaliate / A Loss Opens Your Eyes to the Love You Have
Mane Bakari Shite Iru to Uttaerareru / Nakunatte Hajimete Wakaru Itooshisa
episode.summary: Part A On top of the Odd Jobs building, two awfully familiar men seem to be scheming. They manage to hide themselves from several visitors, but they are spotted by the man who’ll cause the biggest mess of all: Katsura! Part B Gintoki’s alarm goes off, and he decides to takes a shower to sober up. While in the shower, something happens to Gintoki! Seems Kagura and Shinpachi are also caught up in the mess, and they wonder how this could have happened to them... The three heroes face a crisis like none other! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 海に向かってバカヤローとか言う人ってまだいるのだろうか / 人は閉じ込められると自分の中の扉が開く
When a Person Is Trapped, Their Inner Door Opens
Umi ni Mukatte Bakayarou toka Iu Hitotte Mada Iru no Darou ka / Hito wa Tojikomerareru to Jibun no Naka no Tobira ga Hiraku
episode.summary: The Odd Jobs Trio are wrapping up a case and waiting for the elevator inside a skyscraper at night. The client is the president of a huge corporation, and the gang receives a handsome reward. It’s their first huge cash haul in a while, so Gintoki and the gang decide to celebrate by having yakiniku (barbeque). As they excitedly discuss which place they should go to, the elevator arrives. But just when they get on, trouble occurs. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 幾つになっても歯医者は嫌
People of All Ages Hate the Dentist
Ikutsu ni Natte mo Haisha wa Iya
episode.summary: Gintoki’s mouth is swollen like crazy, forcing him to go to the dentist for treatment. Unable to cope with the stress and pressure of waiting, a crazed Gintoki screams for someone to just kill him and be done with it. After getting scolded by the staff, Gintoki waits for his turn when another man with a swollen mouth comes in, making things even more complicated! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カウントダウン開始
Beginning the Countdown
Countdown Kaishi
episode.summary: A look back at Gintama`s best moments. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 夜の蜘蛛は縁起が悪い
A Spider at Night Is a Bad Omen
Yoru no Kumo wa Engi ga Warui
episode.summary: Gintoki and the gang return to Yoshiwara at Hinowa’s request for the first time in a while. Although Hosen’s death has brought freedom to Yoshiwara, it’s also drawn the renewed interest of those who previously avoided Yoshiwara in fear of Hosen’s power. Yoshiwara is now troubled with an increased crime rate, especially illegal drug dealing. Odd Jobs are asked to capture the man responsible. The man in question is said to go by various names, titles, and even faces. The only clue available is the tattooed spider on his neck. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 蜘蛛の糸は一度絡まるとなかなかとれない
Once a Spider`s Thred Has Entangled Something It`s Hard to Get It Off Again
Kumo no Ito wa Ichido Karamaru to nakanaka Torenai
episode.summary: Gintoki and Tsukuyo infiltrate the Benigumoto, the Red Spiders, to get a lead on the man with the tattooed spider on his neck, but are discovered and quickly surrounded. The two manage to fend for themselves, when the man with the tattooed spider makes a sudden appearance and attacks Gintoki! The man then speaks as if he knows Tsukuyo. Who is this man?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チャランポランな奴程怒ると恐い
It`s the Irresponsible One Who`s Scary When Pissed
Charanporan na Yatsu Hodo Okoru to Kowai
episode.summary: Tsukuyo falls into the hands of Jiraia, her former master, and is held captive. Meanwhile Gintoki manages to survive the attack thanks to Zenzo, and he learns about Jiraia’s past. During the Amanto attack twenty years ago, Jiraia is said to have killed his own people within the Oniwabanshu, all for the sake of his devotion to the previous shogun. In the end Jiraia himself was the one to be terminated, but he managed to escape. Now his devotion is directed toward his own creation, Tsukuyo. Jiraia’s motive is to eliminate the bond that she has come to rely upon. And he intends to achieve that goal by setting fire to Yoshiwara and burning down everything! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大切な荷ほど重く背負い難い
The More Precious the Burden, the Heavier and More Difficult It Is to Shoulder It.
Taisetsu na Ni Hodo Omoku Seoinikui
episode.summary: Gintoki strikes down Jiraia and frees Tsukuyo from his twisted web. Chiding Tsukuyo for trying to shoulder every burden herself, Gintoki goes on to say that rather than throw away your life to die beautifully, it’s far better to live and be yourself – even if your life is not a pretty one. And finally, Gintoki expresses his anger toward Jiraia for betraying his own student, despite calling himself a master. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ジャンプアニメツアー 2008 白夜叉降誕
Jump Anime Tour 2008: Birth of White Demon
Jump Anime Tour 2008: Shiroyasha Koutan
酒と女はワンセットで気をつけろ
Watch Out for a Set of Women and a Drink
Sake to Onna wa One Set de Ki o Tsukero
episode.summary: The city of Yoshiwara is making its recovery, though Tsukuyo has shut herself in her room. Hinowa asks Gintoki to help Tsukuyo have some fun for a change. It turns out that Tsukuyo is only pretending to be sleeping in her room, when in reality she is sneaking out to perform her routine patrol. The gang decides to come up with a plan to help Tsukuyo cheer up, even while working. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人気投票なんて糞食らえ
Screw Popularity Polls
NInki Touhyou nante Kuso Kurae
episode.summary: Character popularity results are announced to celebrate Gintama’s 182nd episode! Shinpachi is alone at the café, feeling depressed after learning that he’s still in 8th place in popularity, unchanged from the previous ranking. Yamazaki, who is in 9th place, drops by to say that boring characters such as they should aim to become the No. 1 steppingstone for others. For Shinpachi and Yamazaki, 8th and 9th place should hold the same meaning as 1st. But in reality Yamazaki can’t give up the hope of ranking higher, and runs off in tears. Shinpachi can do nothing but watch, when suddenly Yamazaki’s scream is heard in the distance! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人気投票なんて燃えて灰になれ
Popularity Polls Can Burn in Hell
Ninki Touhyou nante Moete Hai ni Nare
episode.summary: Characters unhappy with the popularity poll results begin attacking high-ranking characters. Surrounded by the low-ranking characters, Shinpachi attempts to escape across the rooftops but loses his footing and falls. Just when Shinpachi thinks he’s done for, he is saved by an unknown hand and manages to flee from Catherine and the other low-ranking characters. When everybody is an enemy, which character would be willing to lend a helping hand? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人気投票なんて・・・
Popularity Polls Can...
Ninki Touhyou nante...
episode.summary: Characters unhappy with the popularity poll results begin attacking high-ranking characters. Surrounded by the low-ranking characters, Shinpachi attempts to escape across the rooftops but loses his footing and falls. Just when Shinpachi thinks he’s done for, he is saved by an unknown hand and manages to flee from Catherine and the other low-ranking characters. When everybody is an enemy, which character would be willing to lend a helping hand? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ラジオ体操は少年少女の社交場 / 今年できる事は今年中にやっちゃった方が区切りがいいんだけどつい来年から仕切り直しゃいーやって思って後回しにしてしまうのが年末のお約束
Mobile Suit Gundam 30th Anniversary Special Extra #2 / Radio Exercises Are Socials for Boys and Girls

Radio Taisou wa Shounen Shoujo no Shakouba / Kotoshi Dekiru Koto wa Kotoshijuu ni Yacchatta Hou ga Kugiri ga Iindakedo Tsui Rainen kara Shikirinaosha Iiyatte Omotte Atomawashi ni Shiteshimau no ga Nenmatsu no Oyakusoku
episode.summary: An old man living in a broken-down home is interviewed by a man who says he is a journalist for the Ooedo newspaper. The interview is regarding the Antiforeigner War. More than twenty years ago, the Antiforeigner faction rose up against the sudden invasion of the Amanto. As the war continued, several young members came to distinguish themselves from the others: Kotaro Katsura, Shinsuke Takasugi, Tatsuma Sakamoto. And then there was another, who ran across the battlefield garbed in white and was feared as the white devil. / Every early morning in Kabukicho, Kagura leaves the house at top speed as soon as she hears the announcement for the radio exercise to start. Despite coming in at the very last minute to receive the attendance stamp, Kagura has perfect attendance this summer. She learns there is another boy who also has perfect attendance. The two gradually become friends, but the boy has his reasons for always coming. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 観察日記は最後までやりきろう
An Observation Journal Should Be Seen Right Through to the Very End
Kansatsu Nikki wa Saigo made Yarikirou
episode.summary: Students at a temple school share their independent research projects completed during the past summer vacation. After one of the students finishes reading a well-written journal, the last one to present is a kid named Daigoro. Sleeping in on the first day of summer vacation, Daigoro arrived late at the radio exercises and met Madao, and decided to keep an observation journal about him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: フラグを踏んだらサヨウナラ
It`s Goodbye Once a Flag Is Set
Flag o Fundara Sayounara
episode.summary: Gintoki and Shinpachi start re-investigating the Rokkaku incident. Upon learning what really happened from Kamiyama, one of Okita’s subordinates, they leave to save Okita. Meanwhile, Okita is captured by Sotatsu Tendo after falling into his trap involving Kirie. Tendo babbles on about how he returned to seek revenge against Okita, who destroyed the Sokai Faction, and goes on to reveal the truth about Kirie’s father. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 死亡フラグに気をつけろ
Beware of Foreshadows
Shibou Flag ni Ki o Tsukero
episode.summary: Okita is going through a selection of sweets at the cake shop. As Okita leaves the store, a girl suddenly comes up and stabs him!! Calling Okita her father’s killer, the girl’s action seems to be fueled by a past case called the “Rokkaku Incident.” What is the connection between this incident and Okita, as well as the girl’s father? And more importantly, what’s the fate of Okita who’s been stabbed right at the start of this episode?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 故郷とおっぱいは遠くにありて思うもの / 蜂に刺されたら小便かけろってアレは迷信です バイ菌が入るから気をつけようね!!
Hometowns and Boobs Are Best Thought from Afar / The Whole Peeing on a Bee Sting Is a Myth. You`ll Get Germs, So Don`t Do It!!
Kokyou to Oppai wa Tooku ni Arite Omou Mono / Hachi ni Sasaretara Shouben Kakerotte Are wa Meishin Desu Baikin ga Hairu kara Ki o Tsukeyou ne!!
episode.summary: The Odd Jobs are requested to remove a hornets’ nest on the temple grounds. Fully armored in protective suits, what awaits the trio is a ginormous hive, like none they’ve ever seen before. Arguing that this wasn’t what they signed up for, Gintoki prepares to leave, but Kagura goes off and destroys the hive. The trio quickly plays dead to avoid getting attacked by the raging hornets, but are instead greeted by something quite unexpected... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: かぶき町野良猫ブルース
Kabukicho Stray Cat Blues
Kabukichou Noraneko Blues
episode.summary: Hordes of stray cats are being caught and brought to the Planet Catnip Embassy. As the Gut Rat Gang watches over the caged cats, the king of Planet Catnip makes his appearance. But there is no news of the king coming to Edo, meaning this is a secret visit. The king reveals his reason for capturing the strays, which turns out to be utterly ridiculous. Mixed up in the king’s plot, the strays find themselves in danger when a battered Hoichi comes to their rescue! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自由とは無法ではなく己のルールで生きること
Freedom Means to Live True to Yourself, Not Without Law!
Jiyuu to wa Muhou de wa Naku Onore no Rule de Ikiru Koto
episode.summary: Having turned into cats, Gintoki and the gang are brought to Otose snack house by Hoichi. As the cats scarf down some food, Otose warns them that if they get caught, they can never return to this town. Seems there is someone egging the townspeople to hunt and capture the town’s stray cats. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 捜しものをする時はそいつの目線になって捜せ
When Looking For Something, Try Using Its Perspective
Sagashimono o Suru Toki wa Soitsu no Mesen ni Natte Sagase
episode.summary: At a shrine in Kabukicho there exists a nesting ground for cats. The Odd Jobs gang hide themselves in the bushes to observe the stray cats feeding themselves. The cats soon run off, and a single cat enters from the Torii side. The torn ears and huge barrel-like body identify the cat as Hoichi, Kabukicho’s boss cat. The Odd Jobs were requested by the neighborhood association to capture Hoichi. Shinpachi and Kagura jump out to catch Hoichi with a net, but the cat easily escapes them. Kagura and Shinpachi ask Gintoki to help out, when they realize Gintoki has mysteriously disappeared! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雨ニモ負ケズ
Not Losing to the Rain
Ame ni mo Makezu
episode.summary: It’s raining in Kabukicho. As Gintoki curses the rain for going against the weather forecast, a woman comes up to offer her umbrella. Feeling bad, Gintoki declines, but the woman hands him the umbrella and tries to leave, revealing herself to be none other than Ms. Ketsuno the weather girl. Due to viewer complaints for reporting the wrong weather, she has been dropped from the show. It is said that rather than using technical data, Ms. Ketsuno reads the stars to predict the weather. However…? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: リヴァイアサンってきいたらどうしてもサザエさんがチラつく俺のバカ!!
Whenever I hear Leviathan, I think of Sazae-san. Stupid Me!!
Leviathantte Kiitara Doushite mo Sazae-san ga Chiratsuku Ore no Baka!!
episode.summary: Snow quietly falls over Kabukicho. The Shinsengumi receives word of anti-foreign faction members gathering at Ikezuya Inn to discuss a supposed takeover of the Terminal. As they prepare to take down the faction, Kondo entrusts his safety to Hijikata—with a booger dangling from his nose. The booger swings with every breath, and the nose is making whistling noises. Worried how it may affect the team’s morale, Hijikata makes every attempt to handle the situation before anybody notices! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 料理は根性
Cooking Is About Guts
Ryouri wa Konjou
episode.summary: The Odd Jobs are having breakfast in the living room, though the only one gorging on egg over rice is Kagura. Turns out ever since Kagura was put in charge of cooking, it’s been egg over rice nonstop. After getting complaints from Gintoki, Kagura goes to Shinpachi’s house to vent her frustration. Otae then invites Kagura to come to a cooking class with her. The class is filled with girls wearing aprons, but amongst them are some odd faces! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 嵐ニモ負ケズ
Not Losing to the Storm
Arashi ni mo Makezu
episode.summary: In order to save Ms. Ketsuno, Seimei agrees to Douman’s proposal of a Shikigami Tag-Team Mystic Death Match. Seimei arrives at the arena only to be captured by Douman, but Gintoki and the gang appears to lend a helping hand. The first match ends in a draw after both the Ketsuno and Shirino clan contestants are disqualified. After seeing how they performed in the first round, Seimei accepts Gintoki and the gang’s skills, and together they prepare for the next round. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風ニモ負ケズ
Not Losing to the Wind
Kaze ni mo Makezu
episode.summary: Weather girl Ms. Ketsuno is giving the wrong weather forecast. Turns out she comes from a line of traditional Onmyojis, and her forecast is not derived from mere fortune-telling but actually by using her Onmyoji powers. But her weather forecast is being sabotaged by someone who is unhappy with Ms. Ketsuno’s career as a weather girl despite her being an Onmyoji. Gintoki and the gang arrive at the Onmyoji mansion where they come face to face with Seimei, Ms. Ketsuno’s older brother. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: イカナル時ニモ笑顔ヲ絶ヤサナイ
Never Losing That Smile
Ikanaru Toki ni mo Egao o Tayasanai
episode.summary: Seimei takes the risk of being dismissed as lead guardian of Edo by undoing the Shikigami placed throughout the city, and fueling himself with all their power to face Douman. Their fierce magic clashes, and Douman is forced onto the defensive as Seimei’s jutsu overwhelms him. Just when the battle seems over, Douman recalls the history between his family and the Ketsun clan as repeatedly told by his father. The mystical mark spreads across Douman’s body! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ソンナ強ク美シイモノニ私ハナリタイ
That`s How I Wish to Be, Beautiful and Strong.
Sonna Tsuyoku Utsukushi Mono ni Watashi wa Naritai
episode.summary: Consumed by negative emotions, Douman is transformed into a giant demon. He now possesses within his body Antenmaru, a demon sealed away over a millennium ago by the desperate efforts of the Ketsuno and Shirino clans. Not even Seimei’s voice can reach to Antenmaru when Gintoki stands before him with his aura-charged wooden sword. How will Gintoki fight the great demon who has returned after a thousand years?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人類みなサンタ
Everybody`s a Santa!
Jinrui Mina Santa
episode.summary: Candidates for Santa appear before Kagura one after another. Their identities on the line, each goes off to prove they are the real deal. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サンタクロースの赤は血の色
Santa Claus Red Is Blood Red!
Santa Claus no Aka wa Chi no Iro
episode.summary: Christmas is just around the corner. Kagura is ready and waiting for her present, only to have Gintoki dodge the subject at every corner. In order to cheer up Kagura, who laments that Santa has never once come to her, the gang decides to hold a Christmas party, except it is also an end-of-the-year pot-party with only a small cake. Kagura is having no fun at all, when two Santa Clauses appear before her! Source: crunchyroll

アニメ銀魂 大反省会
Anime Gintama Daihanseikai
Anime Gintama Daihanseikai
episode.summary: Some of the characters get together and talk about "regrets" they have after 4 years of anime Gintama. Soon they fight over who gets more screen time. Special of the Gintama Harumatsuri 2010 live event.

episode.title: ED 049
Ending 8e (Catherine`s version)
Harumatsuri 2010
銀魂すべらない話
Gintama Round Table 1
Gintama Suberanai Hanashi
銀魂すべらない話2
